story:
Story of A Girl Named Ellie

My name is MaryBeth Edmundson, and I am the author of A Girl Named Ellie. I wrote this book because I hope to be a full-time author. I have loved stories since I can remember... anything with a plot line was — and is — my favorite thing in the world. This story has been with me since I was in high school, and I think it’s time to share this story. My hope is that, in reading this book, you will discover that sometimes it’s okay to fall and get back up. I want you to see this book as an opportunity to grow with my main character and to see challenges from a different perspective. 

A Girl Named Ellie speaks to teenagers and young adults who want to understand self-confidence and coming to terms with anxiety... all with the grace and poise of a figure skater.

Ultimately, I hope that A Girl Named Ellie inspires reflection and fruitful dialogue, pressing into engaging questions such as:

  • How do all types of anxiety impact everyone differently?
  • Really, how difficult is figure skating?
  • Is it possible that the way we interact with people we trust can help us better know ourselves?

I really look forward to exploring these questions and beyond with my readers!

What We Need & What You Get

This book will be published with New Degree Press. I set up the pre-order tiers to help cover the costs for publishing my book. Money raised will go towards the following:

  • The Editor I will work with to revise and publish my manuscript in December, 2021.
  • The Cover Design of my book. (The mockups you see currently are a placeholder!)
  • The Layout Design for the interior of my book (physical copy, ebook formats).
  • The Copyediting for my book to polish the grammar and spelling prior to publication.
  • The Launch & Promotion Efforts for my book when I ultimately publish this Winter.

I am also offering some exclusive rewards for people who pre-order my book now:

  • You will receive a personally signed copy of my book when I publish and a handwritten thank-you note.
  • Your name will appear in the Acknowledgments section of my book (“with Special Thanks to”).
  • You will receive early access to the Introduction and some excerpts from my book, with the opportunity to review it and give me early feedback.
  • You will have the opportunity to be involved in selecting my cover and title.
  • You will be invited to join my Author Community and get behind-the-scenes sneak peeks into the publishing process.

And much more!

Risks & Challenges

The biggest challenge with publishing a book is delivering the finished book to the backer, specifically my mailing of the book to you. I have eliminated this risk by building into the campaign the mailing and shipping costs of your signed copies to you within each pre-order tier.

The risk of delivering the pre-sale copies of my book is contingent on the publisher we use. I will be working closely with New Degree Press to make sure we get the earliest possible ship date of the signed book copy to you. We will keep all pre-sale backers up-to-date as my book hits each key milestone and publishes. You will know when the copies are expected to ship.

Other Ways You Can Help

Not everyone can support, but that doesn't mean you can't get something out of it!
I will reward the top 3 people who refer the most backers at the end of the campaign (30 days). Here's how:

  • At the top of the campaign page, you will see the "share" buttons. Click on the "chain" icon to get a custom link just for you. (Note: don't use the URL in the browser window as it won't work to track referrals and you won't get credit.)
  • Copy that link and paste it on your social media, email it to a friend, or text a fellow book lover.
  • When someone clicks on that link and backs the book, you get 1 entry! 
  • Please use #agirlnamedellie and tag me as well as my publisher, New Degree Press, so we can help amplify your efforts!


Tag: #agirlnamedellie
Instagram: @miss.marybeth / @newdegreepress

Thank you so much for of all of your love and support!

Thanks again,
MaryBeth

About the Author

MaryBeth Edmundson is a full-time undergrad student at Walsh University working towards degrees in both Professional Writing and Philosophy (with minors in English and History!). She is a lover of all things book related and reads constantly. She loves to participate in theatre, musical and otherwise, and was a figure skater for ten years (and participated in competitions as well). On her university campus, she is very active, runs two clubs, takes part in student government, and attends campus ministry events. She hopes that this book will kick start her career as an author, as she cannot picture herself being anything but. When she’s not reading or quoting Marvel and British TV shows, MaryBeth loves hiking, writing (naturally), baking, figure skating (of course), and spending time with her family and friends.

For more information, you can connect with MaryBeth at mareedmundson@gmail.com and on Instagram at
https://www.instagram.com/miss.marybeth/.

story:
Child of Invention.

My name is Luz Emma Cañas Madrigal. I am a Sufi poet, healer, martial artist, and yogi. I have had my own businesses since I was 21. Partially out of necessity but mainly because I was single mother who wasn't willing to sacrifice time away from my cubs and also out of my need for independence. I have built and lost businesses small and large. And have had multiple ideas stolen by big corporations, including American Apparel. Their whole concept was mine. Yup, you can read about it in my memoir! With every curve ball thrown at me in life and business, I have used them as opportunities to adapt and reinvent myself. I have lived multiple lives as a therapist, a fashion designer, a filmmaker, a writer, and a teaching artist. My latest venture is as an indie publisher which allows me to explore all of these elements through books. And ultimately films. 

There is no secret that there is a great deal of elitism and gatekeeping in the publishing world that shuts Black authors out. Even more so for diasporic authors that occupy multiple margins; immigrant, first gen, polyglot, queer, trans, disabled, or mentally ill. And these stories have notoriously stolen, bit and adapted by entities with more money and power making their way into books and films all the while leaving out those that lived them. 

Goal.

It is my vision to establish a Black centered publishing house that will allow authors to maintain control of their creative property and see their stories develop from book to screen. Starting with the production of two books, noir novel by Christopher Taylor and a memoir by me, Luz Emma Cañas. Having been involved in the production of my recently published poetry book, from him to Him, by Maximalist Press, I have learned that equity in practice is very different that equity as an idea. In order to pay all people involved in production a fair wage, things tend to cost more from the author, to designers to printers. Another factor that raises the price is how the book is crafted and its rarity. Martial Love and Blue Eyed Dog are a short run press of 100 books. Only 60 will be sold. Some will be for promotions and others will be placed in the vault. Although I did raise some money from the sales of from him to Him, I didn't make enough for the production of  TWO books. 

How you can support. 

To raise this money, I will be selling incentives from $1-$108. All items related to the art of story- telling and produced by me. I've got art house short films at the low end to a limited edition embossed soft cover at the high end for $108. Feel free to donate just cuz because you believe that stories outside of the mainstream deserve to be told. If you have been following me, you know that I produce quality products with little resources. Imagine what I could do with more! I don't usually ask for handouts but my 50th birthday is coming up so why not?!

In the event that I don't meet my goal, the monies we do receive will go to printing which is the part of production that requires the most amount of money. Printing alone costs $3k per book. For two books, Martial Love and Blue Eyed Dog, I need a minimum of $6k.

Help me tell these and other stories. Buy my stuff! Follow the campaign! Contribute any amount. Spread the word by sharing on social media and among your friends and colleagues. Sharing costs nothing. Thanks in advance for your continued support. 

xoxox,

Luz

For more on Madrigal Publishing's vision, visit the website:

http://www.madrigal-publishing.com/

Follow me on Twitter and IG

@luz_emma_canas

story:
By 2018, sociopolitical extremists had been repurposing long established, profitable science fiction franchises along with a majority of television and film as platforms to espouse propaganda.

Creatives began to force feed consumers with incompetent Ghostbusters, Star Wars, Star Trek and Dr. Who not because these chameleons of false virtue were trying something edgy and new, but because their fringe ideals and preferred extremist versions of racism and sexism was held as a higher priority than honoring the legacy and lore’s that had come before them.

They have no attachment to it.

No love for it.

They do not care about these properties, legacy’s, characters, legends, mythos that the Geeks and Nerds of decades past cherish as escapism from the mundane. The sole intent for these heartless propagandists, is to use what these fans have adored most of their lives as a platform to espouse bigotry, segregation, division and hate.

They mock, use the Mainstream, Access Media to weave false narratives about these customers setting to shame them into obscurity from the very escapist entertainments, the very modern mythologies, the very bastions of inclusion that were once these Fandoms. Hollywood used their weight in the media in an attempt to bludgeon detractors into capitulation.

Across the either of disenfranchised fans came voices independently yet in unison, from WorldClassBullshitters, Midnight’s Edge, Nerdrotic.com to OverlordDVD. Those who have supported and adored these modern myths cried out against perversion of what they love. And the Geeks, Gamers, Nerds and Comic Book enthusiasts came together forming a new bastion of free thought and expression.

They became, The Fandom Menace.

story:
Short Summary


In light of recent events in Afghanistan, I decided that a story should be told about a time when there was a sense of optimism in the country. Those years of optimism began when the Socialist Revolution occurred in April 1978. The socialist struggle would continue after the Soviets intervened in December 1979 to help the Afghans protect their revolution, but the war would make that optimism wither away, therefore I consider the golden age of Socialist Afghanistan to have ended in December 1979. 
 

What We Need & What You Get

For the book I don't need a lot - €500, but those funds would allow me to access all the great sources which would allow me to write the book. 

If you contribute, you would get a free version of the book.

story:
Story of My Book

Adrift in Search of Camellias is a science-fiction novel about VR, neurotechnology, and finding purpose despite failure. It explores themes of complacency, honesty to oneself, and self-discovery. It is set in the near future in Central City, a government that has risen from the ashes of a fallen nation.

My name is Justin Cho and I am the author of Adrift in Search of Camellias. I wrote this book to because I wanted to create something that was an authentic representation of myself. After many emotional lows in my life, I realized how important it was for me to be creative. I took the lessons and energy that I gained from these experiences to create a novel that embodies myself through subject matters that interest me and a story that thematically reflects my own experiences.

My hope with this novel is that it encourages people to think about the true reasons behind their actions and whether what they’re doing is right for them. It is a question that points inward, and one that can help people better understand themselves and the people around them.

My novel is set in the near future, where many of the currently emerging technologies have been realized such as self-driving cars and brain chips. I chose to particularly focus on VR, neurotechnology, and big data algorithms. In this future, sports have developed to gradually become more reliant on technology, and many sports are even played completely online in a virtual reality space. The protagonist is a player of one of these VR sports, but he is stuck in an emotional low. Despite his efforts, he finds himself constantly falling short of his goals, and despite advice that he should quit, he can’t bring himself to do so. This novel is about his journey, finding the confidence to continue, and coming to a deeper understanding of himself.

You will love this book if you are interested in new, upcoming technologies or if you resonate with the emotional journey of the protagonist.

Adrift in Search of Camellias speaks to students and young adults who want to grapple with self-acceptance and finding purpose in a new way.

Ultimately, I hope that Adrift in Search of Camellias inspires reflection and fruitful dialogue, pressing into engaging questions like:

  • Why do we do the things that we do?
  • Are we doing things for ourselves or for what we think others want us to do?
  • What makes something worth committing to?

I look forward to exploring these questions and beyond with my readers.

What I Need & What You'll Get

This book will be published with New Degree Press. I set up the pre-order tiers to help cover the costs for publishing my book. Money raised will go towards the following:

  • The editor I will work with to revise and publish my manuscript in August 2021.
  • The cover design of my book. (The mockups you see currently are a placeholder!)
  • The layout design for the interior of my book (physical copy, ebook formats).
  • The copy editing for my book to polish the grammar and spelling prior to publication.
  • The launch & promotion efforts for my book when I ultimately publish this Fall.

When I pre-sell 120 copies of my book, I will publish a paperback and ebook. When I pre-sell 150 copies of my book, I will also publish a hardcover edition. When I pre-sell 200 copies of my book, I will publish a hardcover and an audiobook.

I am also offering some exclusive rewards for people who pre-order my book now:

  • You will receive a personally signed copy of my book when I publish.
  • Your name will appear in the Acknowledgments section of my book.
  • You will receive early access to the Author’s Note and other excerpts from my book, with the opportunity to review it and give me early feedback.
  • You will have the opportunity to be involved in selecting my cover and title.
  • You will be invited to join my Author Community and get behind-the-scenes sneak peeks into the publishing process.
  • And much more!

About the Author

Justin Cho is a second year student at the University of California, San Diego. He is an engineering major and a member of UC San Diego’s NCAA fencing team.

Justin wrote this book to take an active step towards becoming a creative individual. He hopes to use this book as an opportunity to accurately represent himself and gain experience in the creative process .

In his free time, Justin is an avid player of Chess and Super Smash Bros. In addition, he likes to engage in various creative projects such as a podcast, rap music, and an Instagram meme page.

For more information, you can connect with Justin at jwcho315@gmail.com and at @justincho_author on Instagram.

International Preorders

For international preorders, please send me a private message.

Risks & Challenges

The biggest challenge with publishing a book is delivering the finished book to the backer, specifically my mailing of the book to you. I have eliminated this risk by including the cost of mailing and shipping the signed copies into each pre-order tier.

The risk of delivering the pre-sale copies of my book is contingent on the publisher we use. I will be working closely with New Degree Press to make sure we ship the pre-order rewards to you as early as possible. We will keep all pre-sale backers up-to-date as to when my book will publish. You will know when the copies of my book you pre-ordered are expected to ship.

Other Ways You Can Help

Some people just can't contribute, but that doesn't mean they can't help:

  • Please share my pre-sale campaign on Facebook, Twitter, and LinkedIn with your friends, family and network. Please use #AdriftInSearchofCamellias and tag me as well as my publisher, New Degree Press, so we can help amplify your efforts.
  • You can easily share my Pre-Sale Campaign Page via Indiegogo at the top of the page.
  • Please share my book with 5 friends, family members, or co-workers who you think would enjoy it via text or direct message on social media.

Thank you so much for of all of your love and support!

Thanks again,
Justin Cho

story:
Short Summary

Hello! I'm Mandy Olivam, a writer, retreat facilitator, and content creator living in Louisville, KY with my family.

I love to accompany people on their deep life journeys! For over a decade, I've been inviting folks into processes that explore the intersections between personal growth, social change, and spiritual exploration. Now, I have compiled a book that I'm ready to share with the world.

What I Need & What You Get

I have found a wonderful organization, Loam, that can help me format and print this book to be both a beautiful resource and a highly eco-consciously-printed book. I am inviting people to pre-order a book to help me cover the up-front costs for this process!

  • Combined editorial, design, and printing fees amount to about $4,000, which is the goal for this campaign!
  • By contributing the cost of a book ($25), you have essentially pre-ordered it and will receive it promptly once the final print happens this spring!
  • If you contribute more than the cost of one book, you can receive extra perks from me, like a personal love note or a mandala in the colors of your choice!

A Humble Offering

It's taken me many years to cultivate the confidence to share my writings with a printer, and once I did, I was wildly affirmed that I have something helpful to offer:

  • This book offers beautiful reflections you can read daily or weekly to inspire you.
  • This book has customizable practices to help you live your life with more intention, self-care, and community consciousness.
  • I humbly offer my work as nourishment for YOUR work and being in the world.

Other Ways You Can Help

If you cannot contribute financially at this time, you owe me NO explanation or reason - I understand we are in tough times on myriad levels. My hope is that, once my books are in my hands, I find ways to share them with folks who cannot purchase. Meanwhile, you can still support my initiative, should you wish! 

  • You can share this campaign on social media
  • You can share this campaign with folks who may have interest in pre-ordering a book

My deepest, most reverent gratitude goes to each of you for you overwhelming support of me in all capacities. Thank you!

story:
*** Book available in English and Italian | Libro disponibile in inglese e italiano ***

Extinguished Countries is the first guidebook series to countries that no longer exist. We don’t follow today’s borders but take you on a journey through time and space to lost kingdoms, republics and empires, looking for what unites us rather than divides us. It's a time machine for travellers! Our first guidebook is about the Republic of Venice but many others will follow (Austro-Hungarian Empire, Ottoman Empire...).

Extinguished Countries è la prima serie di guide dedicate a paesi che non esistono più. Non seguiamo i confini di oggi, ma ti portiamo in viaggio nel tempo e nello spazio verso regni, repubbliche e imperi perduti, cercando ciò che ci unisce piuttosto che ciò che ci divide. È una macchina del tempo per viaggiatori! La nostra prima guida è sulla Serenissima ma molte altre seguiranno (Impero austro-ungarico, Impero ottomano...).

Here's the video in Italian | Qui il video in italiano :

The world as we know it today has changed many times throughout history. Take an old map from 100 or 200 years ago and try to point to some of your familiar places. Found yourself in trouble? Maybe they have a new name, or they're divided by a border that today no longer exists. That's the evolution of history: the state we live in succeeded an ancestor from the past, the language we speak has long and intricate roots, and even our identity is a combination of diverse influences. Extinguished Countries dives into all this!

Il mondo non è sempre stato come lo conosciamo oggi. Basta dare un’occhiata ad una cartina vecchia di 100 o 200 anni e si fa già fatica a riconoscere i luoghi più familiari, magari perché indicati con un altro nome, o perché separati da qualche confine oggi inesistente. È l'evoluzione della storia. Lo Stato in cui viviamo nasce da un antenato del passato, la lingua che parliamo ha radici lunghe e intricate e persino la nostra identità è una combinazione di diverse influenze. Le guide degli Stati scomparsi si immergono in tutto questo!

Why is this important | Perché è importante

At a time when Europe is experiencing resurgent nationalism, the Extinguished Countries guidebooks show that throughout history countries change and leave behind composite and stratified cultural legacies. As a result, today we have many things in common, not only with our neighbours, but also with people that might live far away but were once connected to us. There are legends, traditions, dishes that we share from our common past, and that bring us closer rather than farther apart.

In un momento in cui l'Europa vive un ritorno dei nazionalismi, le guide degli Stati scomparsi mostrano che nel corso della storia i paesi cambiano e lasciano dietro a sé delle eredità culturali composite e stratificate. Al punto che oggi, abbiamo molte cose in comune, non solo con i nostri vicini di casa ma anche con persone che abitano magari lontano da noi, ma a cui un tempo eravamo legati. Ci sono leggende, tradizioni, piatti che condividiamo dal nostro passato comune e che ci avvicinano agli altri piuttosto che separarci.

Brudet/Brodetto (a fish stew) connecting people :-)

This is not a nostalgic or revisionist journey. Even if our guides play the game of imagining that a former country still exists, their objective is not to celebrate defunct political realities. On the contrary: by interviewing people from Venice to Cyprus, we show different perspectives. Also, our guidebooks introduce a new way of travelling. You’ll be walking on today’s streets, but at the same time travelling back in time, following maps and itineraries from the past. It's a sort of augmented reality that allows you to hop on and off from the present into the past.  

Queste guide non sono né nostalgiche né revisioniste. Si prestano al gioco di immaginare che lo Stato scomparso esista ancora, ma il loro obiettivo non è quello di celebrare delle realtà politiche defunte. Al contrario: intervistando persone da Venezia a Cipro, vogliamo mostrare i diversi punti di vista. Inoltre, queste guide propongono un nuovo modo di viaggiare. Camminerai per le strade di oggi, ma viaggerai anche indietro nel tempo, seguendo mappe e itinerari del passato. È come realtà aumentata che ti permette di fare la spola tra presente e passato.

This is a mockup image of how the book will look like.

The Republic of Venice | La Repubblica di Venezia

The Republic of Venice was a 1000-year old state that disappeared in 1797. It's a story of maritime routes, spice trade and naval battles all over Middle Ages and Renaissance period. Geographically, it encompassed territories that today are part of Italy, Slovenia, Croatia, Montenegro, Albania, Greece and Cyprus. We decided to start with this "Extinguished country" because we are a Mediterranean team (Jump to the "Who we are" section to learn more about us!). 

La Repubblica di Venezia è uno stato millenario “scomparso” nel 1797. È una storia di rotte marittime, commercio di spezie e battaglie navali che attraversano Medioevo e Rinascimento. Geograficamente, comprendeva territori che oggi fanno parte di Italia, Slovenia, Croazia, Montenegro, Albania, Grecia e Cipro. Iniziamo con questo “Stato scomparso" perché siamo una squadra sostanzialmente mediterranea (vai alla sezione "Chi siamo" per saperne di più!).

Before becoming the city we know, with its treasures and problems, balancing between mass tourism and the emigration of its inhabitants, Venice was the capital of a great republic. We want to take you back in time, when the flag of the Serenissima flew from Bergamo to Nicosia. Why? Precisely to depict and experience Venice differently, not only in its current historic centre, but also in those areas which for centuries were part of this Republic and contributed to its development. 

Prima di diventare la città che conosciamo, con i suoi tesori e i suoi problemi, in bilico tra turismo di massa e l'emigrazione dei suoi abitanti, Venezia era la capitale di una grande repubblica. Vogliamo riportarti indietro al tempo in cui la bandiera di San Marco sventolava da Bergamo a Nicosia. Perché? Proprio per raccontare Venezia in un modo nuovo, visitando non solo il suo attuale centro storico, ma anche quelle aree che per secoli hanno fatto parte della Serenissima e hanno contribuito al suo sviluppo.

What's in the book | Cosa c'è nel libro

TREASURE MAPS - Move on foot, by boat or on a horse - we've got you covered. The book features dozens of maps and itineraries that will guide you to the places overlooked by the mainstream guides, and yet full of exciting stories (couple of ghost towns also included!)

MAPPE DEL TESORO - Muoviti a piedi, in barca o con qualsiasi mezzo tu preferisca - non ti perderai! Abbiamo preparato decine di mappe e di itinerari che ti guideranno verso dei luoghi pieni di storie emozionanti ma trascurati dalle guide tradizionali (ti porteremo persino in un paio di città fantasma!).

A MINE OF INFORMATION - Where does the word “ghetto” come from? Where was Marco Polo born? This guide is the result of hundreds of interviews with historians, linguists, chefs... You'll get their best stories and insights as well as extra book, movie and travel tips.

UNA MINIERA DI INFORMAZIONI - Da dove arriva la parola “ghetto”? Dove è nato Marco Polo? Questa guida è il risultato di centinaia di interviste con storici, linguisti, cuochi... Ritroverai le loro migliori storie e consigli nel libro, così come consigli di lettura, di film o di viaggio.

INFOGRAPHICS - Don’t worry, this guide is not a boring history book. You're not in for a long, dull read full of battle dates and unpronounceable treaties. Instead, colourful infographics will help you move through time and space, guiding you to find the best location for a dive in the Adriatic sea and the juiciest platter of scampi around.

INFOGRAFICHE - Non ti preoccupare, questo non è un libro di storia. Non stai per imbarcarti in una lettura lunga e noiosa, piena di date e nomi da ricordare. Al contrario, delle infografiche colorate ti aiuteranno a muoverti nel tempo e nello spazio, guidandoti verso il posto migliore per un tuffo in Adriatico e un buon piatto di scampi

A POCKET TIME MACHINE - In 250 pages, you will find all the information you need to travel through 7 countries, more than 40 cities and over 10 centuries of history. Its pocket format makes it a convenient read not only during your travel preparations but also throughout your journey. 

UNA PICCOLA MACCHINA DEL TEMPO - In 250 pagine, avrai tutte le informazioni necessarie per viaggiare attraverso 7 paesi, più di 40 città e oltre 10 secoli di storia. È un formato tascabile che puoi leggere prima di partire ma anche durante il viaggio.

An illustration of the salt pans in Piran, Slovenia.

Why support us | Perché sostenerci

In the past two years, we interviewed over 400 people from Italy to Cyprus. We gathered their stories and different perspectives about the Republic of Venice. Now we are in the process of turning those interviews into a book. We have also selected some of our best stories and turned them into podcast episodes. In the next months, we will keep working on the texts and creating new maps, infographics and illustrations. So, we need your support to complete the book and pay our collaborators (we are all freelancers here!) and to print it. 

Negli ultimi due anni abbiamo intervistato oltre 400 persone dall'Italia a Cipro. Abbiamo raccolto le loro storie e punti di vista sulla Repubblica di Venezia. Ora, stiamo trasformando quelle interviste in un libro. Abbiamo anche selezionato alcune delle nostre migliori storie e le abbiamo trasformate in un podcast audio. Nei prossimi mesi continueremo a lavorare sui testi e creeremo anche nuove mappe, infografiche e illustrazioni. Abbiamo quindi bisogno del tuo aiuto per completare il libro, pagare i nostri collaboratori (siamo tutti freelance!) e poi andare in stampa.

Who are we | Chi siamo

GIOVANNI VALE - Author of Extinguished Countries. Italian journalist covering South East Europe for many media outlets and author of 8 guidebooks for Petit Futé, Gallimard and Touring Club Italiano.  Passionate about old stories, local legends, and improbable recipes. | Autore delle guide degli Stati scomparsi. Giornalista corrispondente da Zagabria per diverse testate europee e autore di 8 guide turistiche per Petit Futé, Gallimard e Touring Club Italiano. Appassionato di vecchie storie, leggende e ricette strane. 

IVANA POGACIC - Interpreter and translator of English, French and Croatian. Fixer for foreign journalists in Croatia. In charge of translations at Extinguished Countries and much more. | Interprete e traduttrice di inglese, francese e croato. Fixer per giornalisti stranieri. Si occupa delle traduzioni per Extinguished Countries e molto altro.

HRVOJE ZIVCIC - Croatian award-winning typographer and graphic designer, working on various typeface designs and editorial projects. Designed Extinguished Countries' logo, visual identity and layout of the book. | Tipografo e designer pluripremiato, autore di font e progetti editoriali. Ha disegnato il logo, l'identità visuale e il layout di Extinguished Countries.

IVA HRVATIN - Croatian designer and illustrator. Working on projects of brand design, illustrating guidebooks and cookbooks. She draws the maps and illustrations at Extinguished Countries. | Designer e illustratrice croata. Lavora su progetti di brand design e disegna guide e libri di ricette. Disegna le mappe e le illustrazioni per Extinguished Countries.

PAUL PRESCOTT - English and French award-winning photographer and filmmaker. Founder of Amazing Aerial Agency and WE’RE THOSE production. He directed the Extinguished Countries crowdfunding film. | Fotografo e videografo franco-inglese pluripremiato. Fondatore di Amazing Aerial Agency e WE’RE THOSE production. Ha diretto il video di Extinguished Countries.

FELIPE ULLMANN TRENTINI - Brazilian cinematographer and editor at WE’RE THOSE production. | Videografo brasiliano alla WE’RE THOSE production.

JULIEN TRAMBOUZE - French journalist at Radio France. Author of radio reports for RFI and RTS. Ecology expert and radio teacher (OIF, Journalism school of Montpellier). He produced the Extinguished Countries podcast. | Giornalista a Radio France. Autore di reportage per RFI e RTS. Esperto di ecologia e prof di giornalismo radio (OIF, Journalism school of Montpellier). Ha prodotto il podcast di Extinguished Countries.

Our rewards | Le ricompense

POSTCARDS | CARTOLINE – We made three super nice postcards (18x11.5 cm) with motifs from the Republic of Venice connecting the present (black & white) and the past (red) in a unique and creative way. We tell three stories: The plague doctor, Marco Polo in captivity and United by Malvasia | Abbiamo realizzato tre cartoline esclusive (18x11,5 cm). Raccontano ciascuna una storia della Repubblica di Venezia mostrando il legame tra passato (rosso) e presente (bianco e nero). Le tre storie: Il medico della peste, Marco Polo in prigione e Uniti dalla Malvasia. 

MAP POSTER | LA MAPPA POSTER – An exclusive diachronic map of the Republic of Venice to easily get around and imagine this once huge territory. It's biiig (100x70 cm) and will include a selection of stories and places mentioned in the book. | Un'enorme mappa diacronica della Repubblica di Venezia (100x70 cm)! Conterrà una selezione di luoghi e storie presenti in guida. Disegnata esclusivamente per questa campagna.

THE BOOK | IL LIBRO – The first Extinguished Countries guidebook, The Republic of Venice is a beautiful full-colour softcover book, 250 pages, 14 x 21,5 cm. It's a journey through 7 countries, more than 40 cities and countless stories told by more than 400 people + illustrations, photos, maps, infographics, timelines and itineraries to guide you through. | La prima guida degli Stati scomparsi sulla Repubblica di Venezia! Un formato tascabile (14 x 21,5 cm) di 250 pagine, interamente a colori. Ti guiderà attraverso 7 paesi e più di 40 città, raccontandoti le storie che abbiamo raccolto dopo oltre 400 interviste. Ci sono illustrazioni, foto, mappe, infografiche e itinerari.

Here's the video in Italian | Qui il video in italiano :

The world as we know it today has changed many times throughout history. Take an old map from 100 or 200 years ago and try to point to some of your familiar places. Found yourself in trouble? Maybe they have a new name, or they're divided by a border that today no longer exists. That's the evolution of history: the state we live in succeeded an ancestor from the past, the language we speak has long and intricate roots, and even our identity is a combination of diverse influences. Extinguished Countries dives into all this!
Il mondo non è sempre stato come lo conosciamo oggi. Basta dare un’occhiata ad una cartina vecchia di 100 o 200 anni e si fa già fatica a riconoscere i luoghi più familiari, magari perché indicati con un altro nome, o perché separati da qualche confine oggi inesistente. È l'evoluzione della storia. Lo Stato in cui viviamo nasce da un antenato del passato, la lingua che parliamo ha radici lunghe e intricate e persino la nostra identità è una combinazione di diverse influenze. Le guide degli Stati scomparsi si immergono in tutto questo!
Why is this important | Perché è importante

At a time when Europe is experiencing resurgent nationalism, the Extinguished Countries guidebooks show that throughout history countries change and leave behind composite and stratified cultural legacies. As a result, today we have many things in common, not only with our neighbours, but also with people that might live far away but were once connected to us. There are legends, traditions, dishes that we share from our common past, and that bring us closer rather than farther apart.
In un momento in cui l'Europa vive un ritorno dei nazionalismi, le guide degli Stati scomparsi mostrano che nel corso della storia i paesi cambiano e lasciano dietro a sé delle eredità culturali composite e stratificate. Al punto che oggi, abbiamo molte cose in comune, non solo con i nostri vicini di casa ma anche con persone che abitano magari lontano da noi, ma a cui un tempo eravamo legati. Ci sono leggende, tradizioni, piatti che condividiamo dal nostro passato comune e che ci avvicinano agli altri piuttosto che separarci.

Brudet/Brodetto (a fish stew) connecting people :-)
This is not a nostalgic or revisionist journey. Even if our guides play the game of imagining that a former country still exists, their objective is not to celebrate defunct political realities. On the contrary: by interviewing people from Venice to Cyprus, we show different perspectives. Also, our guidebooks introduce a new way of travelling. You’ll be walking on today’s streets, but at the same time travelling back in time, following maps and itineraries from the past. It's a sort of augmented reality that allows you to hop on and off from the present into the past.  
Queste guide non sono né nostalgiche né revisioniste. Si prestano al gioco di immaginare che lo Stato scomparso esista ancora, ma il loro obiettivo non è quello di celebrare delle realtà politiche defunte. Al contrario: intervistando persone da Venezia a Cipro, vogliamo mostrare i diversi punti di vista. Inoltre, queste guide propongono un nuovo modo di viaggiare. Camminerai per le strade di oggi, ma viaggerai anche indietro nel tempo, seguendo mappe e itinerari del passato. È come realtà aumentata che ti permette di fare la spola tra presente e passato.

This is a mockup image of how the book will look like.
The Republic of Venice | La Repubblica di Venezia

The Republic of Venice was a 1000-year old state that disappeared in 1797. It's a story of maritime routes, spice trade and naval battles all over Middle Ages and Renaissance period. Geographically, it encompassed territories that today are part of Italy, Slovenia, Croatia, Montenegro, Albania, Greece and Cyprus. We decided to start with this "Extinguished country" because we are a Mediterranean team (Jump to the "Who we are" section to learn more about us!). 
La Repubblica di Venezia è uno stato millenario “scomparso” nel 1797. È una storia di rotte marittime, commercio di spezie e battaglie navali che attraversano Medioevo e Rinascimento. Geograficamente, comprendeva territori che oggi fanno parte di Italia, Slovenia, Croazia, Montenegro, Albania, Grecia e Cipro. Iniziamo con questo “Stato scomparso" perché siamo una squadra sostanzialmente mediterranea (vai alla sezione "Chi siamo" per saperne di più!).

Before becoming the city we know, with its treasures and problems, balancing between mass tourism and the emigration of its inhabitants, Venice was the capital of a great republic. We want to take you back in time, when the flag of the Serenissima flew from Bergamo to Nicosia. Why? Precisely to depict and experience Venice differently, not only in its current historic centre, but also in those areas which for centuries were part of this Republic and contributed to its development. 
Prima di diventare la città che conosciamo, con i suoi tesori e i suoi problemi, in bilico tra turismo di massa e l'emigrazione dei suoi abitanti, Venezia era la capitale di una grande repubblica. Vogliamo riportarti indietro al tempo in cui la bandiera di San Marco sventolava da Bergamo a Nicosia. Perché? Proprio per raccontare Venezia in un modo nuovo, visitando non solo il suo attuale centro storico, ma anche quelle aree che per secoli hanno fatto parte della Serenissima e hanno contribuito al suo sviluppo.
What's in the book | Cosa c'è nel libro


TREASURE MAPS - Move on foot, by boat or on a horse - we've got you covered. The book features dozens of maps and itineraries that will guide you to the places overlooked by the mainstream guides, and yet full of exciting stories (couple of ghost towns also included!)
MAPPE DEL TESORO - Muoviti a piedi, in barca o con qualsiasi mezzo tu preferisca - non ti perderai! Abbiamo preparato decine di mappe e di itinerari che ti guideranno verso dei luoghi pieni di storie emozionanti ma trascurati dalle guide tradizionali (ti porteremo persino in un paio di città fantasma!).

A MINE OF INFORMATION - Where does the word “ghetto” come from? Where was Marco Polo born? This guide is the result of hundreds of interviews with historians, linguists, chefs... You'll get their best stories and insights as well as extra book, movie and travel tips.
UNA MINIERA DI INFORMAZIONI - Da dove arriva la parola “ghetto”? Dove è nato Marco Polo? Questa guida è il risultato di centinaia di interviste con storici, linguisti, cuochi... Ritroverai le loro migliori storie e consigli nel libro, così come consigli di lettura, di film o di viaggio.

INFOGRAPHICS - Don’t worry, this guide is not a boring history book. You're not in for a long, dull read full of battle dates and unpronounceable treaties. Instead, colourful infographics will help you move through time and space, guiding you to find the best location for a dive in the Adriatic sea and the juiciest platter of scampi around.
INFOGRAFICHE - Non ti preoccupare, questo non è un libro di storia. Non stai per imbarcarti in una lettura lunga e noiosa, piena di date e nomi da ricordare. Al contrario, delle infografiche colorate ti aiuteranno a muoverti nel tempo e nello spazio, guidandoti verso il posto migliore per un tuffo in Adriatico e un buon piatto di scampi

A POCKET TIME MACHINE - In 250 pages, you will find all the information you need to travel through 7 countries, more than 40 cities and over 10 centuries of history. Its pocket format makes it a convenient read not only during your travel preparations but also throughout your journey. 
UNA PICCOLA MACCHINA DEL TEMPO - In 250 pagine, avrai tutte le informazioni necessarie per viaggiare attraverso 7 paesi, più di 40 città e oltre 10 secoli di storia. È un formato tascabile che puoi leggere prima di partire ma anche durante il viaggio.

An illustration of the salt pans in Piran, Slovenia.
Why support us | Perché sostenerci

In the past two years, we interviewed over 400 people from Italy to Cyprus. We gathered their stories and different perspectives about the Republic of Venice. Now we are in the process of turning those interviews into a book. We have also selected some of our best stories and turned them into podcast episodes. In the next months, we will keep working on the texts and creating new maps, infographics and illustrations. So, we need your support to complete the book and pay our collaborators (we are all freelancers here!) and to print it. 
Negli ultimi due anni abbiamo intervistato oltre 400 persone dall'Italia a Cipro. Abbiamo raccolto le loro storie e punti di vista sulla Repubblica di Venezia. Ora, stiamo trasformando quelle interviste in un libro. Abbiamo anche selezionato alcune delle nostre migliori storie e le abbiamo trasformate in un podcast audio. Nei prossimi mesi continueremo a lavorare sui testi e creeremo anche nuove mappe, infografiche e illustrazioni. Abbiamo quindi bisogno del tuo aiuto per completare il libro, pagare i nostri collaboratori (siamo tutti freelance!) e poi andare in stampa.

Who are we | Chi siamo


GIOVANNI VALE - Author of Extinguished Countries. Italian journalist covering South East Europe for many media outlets and author of 8 guidebooks for Petit Futé, Gallimard and Touring Club Italiano.  Passionate about old stories, local legends, and improbable recipes. | Autore delle guide degli Stati scomparsi. Giornalista corrispondente da Zagabria per diverse testate europee e autore di 8 guide turistiche per Petit Futé, Gallimard e Touring Club Italiano. Appassionato di vecchie storie, leggende e ricette strane. 
IVANA POGACIC - Interpreter and translator of English, French and Croatian. Fixer for foreign journalists in Croatia. In charge of translations at Extinguished Countries and much more. | Interprete e traduttrice di inglese, francese e croato. Fixer per giornalisti stranieri. Si occupa delle traduzioni per Extinguished Countries e molto altro.
HRVOJE ZIVCIC - Croatian award-winning typographer and graphic designer, working on various typeface designs and editorial projects. Designed Extinguished Countries' logo, visual identity and layout of the book. | Tipografo e designer pluripremiato, autore di font e progetti editoriali. Ha disegnato il logo, l'identità visuale e il layout di Extinguished Countries.
IVA HRVATIN - Croatian designer and illustrator. Working on projects of brand design, illustrating guidebooks and cookbooks. She draws the maps and illustrations at Extinguished Countries. | Designer e illustratrice croata. Lavora su progetti di brand design e disegna guide e libri di ricette. Disegna le mappe e le illustrazioni per Extinguished Countries.
PAUL PRESCOTT - English and French award-winning photographer and filmmaker. Founder of Amazing Aerial Agency and WE’RE THOSE production. He directed the Extinguished Countries crowdfunding film. | Fotografo e videografo franco-inglese pluripremiato. Fondatore di Amazing Aerial Agency e WE’RE THOSE production. Ha diretto il video di Extinguished Countries.
FELIPE ULLMANN TRENTINI - Brazilian cinematographer and editor at WE’RE THOSE production. | Videografo brasiliano alla WE’RE THOSE production.
JULIEN TRAMBOUZE - French journalist at Radio France. Author of radio reports for RFI and RTS. Ecology expert and radio teacher (OIF, Journalism school of Montpellier). He produced the Extinguished Countries podcast. | Giornalista a Radio France. Autore di reportage per RFI e RTS. Esperto di ecologia e prof di giornalismo radio (OIF, Journalism school of Montpellier). Ha prodotto il podcast di Extinguished Countries.
Our rewards | Le ricompense

POSTCARDS | CARTOLINE – We made three super nice postcards (18x11.5 cm) with motifs from the Republic of Venice connecting the present (black & white) and the past (red) in a unique and creative way. We tell three stories: The plague doctor, Marco Polo in captivity and United by Malvasia | Abbiamo realizzato tre cartoline esclusive (18x11,5 cm). Raccontano ciascuna una storia della Repubblica di Venezia mostrando il legame tra passato (rosso) e presente (bianco e nero). Le tre storie: Il medico della peste, Marco Polo in prigione e Uniti dalla Malvasia. 

MAP POSTER | LA MAPPA POSTER – An exclusive diachronic map of the Republic of Venice to easily get around and imagine this once huge territory. It's biiig (100x70 cm) and will include a selection of stories and places mentioned in the book. | Un'enorme mappa diacronica della Repubblica di Venezia (100x70 cm)! Conterrà una selezione di luoghi e storie presenti in guida. Disegnata esclusivamente per questa campagna.

THE BOOK | IL LIBRO – The first Extinguished Countries guidebook, The Republic of Venice is a beautiful full-colour softcover book, 250 pages, 14 x 21,5 cm. It's a journey through 7 countries, more than 40 cities and countless stories told by more than 400 people + illustrations, photos, maps, infographics, timelines and itineraries to guide you through. | La prima guida degli Stati scomparsi sulla Repubblica di Venezia! Un formato tascabile (14 x 21,5 cm) di 250 pagine, interamente a colori. Ti guiderà attraverso 7 paesi e più di 40 città, raccontandoti le storie che abbiamo raccolto dopo oltre 400 interviste. Ci sono illustrazioni, foto, mappe, infografiche e itinerari.

story:
Short Summary

I’m Up To Something is a memoir about a first generation Latino and defining success. Being born to immigrant parents and low socio economic status meant overcoming adversity and the imposter syndrome after pursuing engineering as an undergraduate, which then allowed the leveraging of interpersonal and technical skills for real estate, investing and writing.

Some early defining moments charting my present and future successes include: sales at the age of eight, being identified as a gifted child too late, overcoming low socio economic status, enrollment into foster care, heartbreak, near death experience and being the first in his family to attend and graduate from university.


My hope is that by reading this book you will rediscover your own passions and creativity to then leverage interpersonal and technical skills for seemingly unrelated disciplines. I want you to see this book as an opportunity to learn that despite being first generation and having to “catch up” to those with more resources and established families, education, tenacity and imagination can be great assets towards advancement. I owe my success to having an empowered and educated community with astute professionals that provided mentorship in benchmarking my  career in STEM to then pursue real estate, investing and writing with confidence.


In this book, you'll encounter multifaceted dimensions of overcoming the imposter syndrome as a first generation Latino and the power of education, self discipline and community through narratives like:

  • Being an entrepreneur at eight years old selling Pokemon cards to try and support his parents
  • Leaving home at age seventeen for University as a necessary and difficult decision to overcome low socio economic status
  • Presenting to notable members of the Metropolitan Water District during high school
  • Deciding to pursue concurrent careers in Engineering, Real Estate and Writing

You will love this book if you are or know someone who is

  • Rising from low socio economic status
  • An ally to the Latino/Latina community
  • First generation born in the United States
  • A person of color in a white dominated industry
  • Believe concurrent careers are a possible reality for you
  • Deliberating or deciding to pursue STEM as a field of interest
  • A fan of stories dealing with overcoming adversity to achieve greatness


I’m Up To Something speaks to aspiring and existing STEM professionals and first generation Latinos/Latinas who want to grapple with pursuing multiple careers and the imposter syndrome in a new way.

Ultimately, I hope that I’m Up To Something inspires introspection and fruitful dialogue, pressing into engaging questions like:

  • Will I allow myself to have a satisfying career(s) and believe that I am capable?
  • How has my community involvement contributed to my development and branding?
  • How can I use adversity as a source of strength?
  • After a post pandemic world, will I be able to take advantage of virtual trend for my career(s)?


I look forward to exploring these questions and beyond with my readers. I believe discussing the imposter syndrome, concurrent careers, adversity, professional development and education for advancement will change us all for the better.

 

The Book - I’m Up To Something

I'm Up To Something is written in 3 parts.

Part 1 contains the author’s note + chapters 1 - 5. I open my book with my early childhood and teenage experiences that were defining themes for my adult life. Experiencing sales at age eight, being taken into foster care at age nine, missing the opportunity for a gifted curriculum before entering middle school, presenting to the Metropolitan Water District before leaving high school and leaving home at age seventeen to establish my independence are some of my life events that I will explore.

Part 2 contains chapters 6 - 10. I explore my young adult life during my undergraduate experience at California State University, Northridge. The defining moments of deciding on a major, experiencing paid acting, romance + heartbreak and graduation  are some of my life events that I will explore.

Part 3 contains chapters 11 - 15. I explore how graduating as a STEM major prepared me for my multi career practice in engineering, real estate, investing and writing. This is only the beginning towards a fruitful, fulfilling and exciting evolution that will eventually take me into acting. 

 

What We Need & What You Get

This book will be published with New Degree Press. I set up the pre-order tiers to help cover the costs for publishing my book. Money raised will go towards the following:

  • The editor I will work with to revise and publish my manuscript in July 2021
  • The cover design of my book. (The mockups you see currently are a placeholder!)
  • The layout design for the interior of my book (physical copy, ebook formats).
  • The copy editing for my book to polish the grammar and spelling prior to publication.
  • The launch & promotion efforts for my book when I ultimately publish this August 2021

When I pre-sell 120 copies of my book, I will publish a paperback and ebook. When I pre-sell 150 copies of my book, I will also publish a hardcover edition. When I pre-sell 200 copies of my book, I will publish a hardcover and an audiobook.

I am also offering some exclusive rewards for people who pre-order my book now:
  • You will receive a personally signed copy of my book when I publish.
  • A handwritten thank you note for pre-ordering my book
  • Your name will appear in the Acknowledgments section of my book.
  • Early access to the Author’s Note and other excerpts from my book, with the opportunity to review it and give me early feedback.
  • The opportunity to be involved in selecting my cover and provide me feedback.
  • You will be invited to join my Author Community and get behind-the-scenes sneak peeks into the publishing process.

And much more!

 

About the Author

Bartholomew Perez is a systems architect engineer at a fortune 100 defense company, Realtor® at one of the world’s most innovative and fastest growing brokers listed on the New York Stock Exchange (NYSE), real estate investor, day trader and author with New Degree Press. He grew up as a first generation Latino of low socio economic status to Oaxacan parents. Despite the adversity, he reframed tribulation as a source of strength.

After being asked “how are you able to do it all?” countless times, he felt a responsibility to share about his multi career experience manifesting itself during childhood and early adulthood. His biggest source of inspiration is his mother because she was head of household, raising three children and remained engaged during early k-12 education. His passion for community, advancement and problem solving compelled him to write his story for those with similar aspirations to believe and trust that they can do the same for themselves.

Although he spends a lot of time working, he makes a conscious effort to sustain physical, mental and spiritual health through CrossFit, camping, traveling to new destinations and mentoring students and young professionals. His two kittens keep him grounded and accountable for creating a thriving household with music, Netflix reruns and dance parties.

For more information, you can connect with Bartholomew Perez via

email 
bartholomew@imuptosomething.com

Instagram: 
BartholomewPerez
BartholomewRealEstate
Bartholomew.Author
Bartholomew.SHPE

LinkedIn:
Bartholomew Perez

I will be using the hashtags: #ImUpToSomething throughout my campaign.

 

International Preorders

For international preorders, please send me a private message.

 

Risks & Challenges

The biggest challenge with publishing a book is delivering the finished book to the backer, specifically my mailing of the book to you. I have eliminated this risk by including the cost of mailing and shipping the signed copies into each pre-order tier. 

The risk of delivering the pre-sale copies of my book is contingent on the publisher we use. I will be working closely with New Degree Press to make sure we ship the pre-order rewards to you as early as possible. We will keep all pre-sale backers up-to-date as to when my book will publish. You will know when the copies of my book you pre-ordered are expected to ship.

 

Other Ways You Can Help

Some people just can't contribute, but that doesn't mean they can't help:

Please share my pre-sale campaign on Instagram, Facebook, LinkedIn and Twitter with your friends, family and network. Please use #ImUpToSomething and tag me as well as my publisher, New Degree Press, so we can help amplify your efforts.

You can easily share my Pre-Sale Campaign Page via Indiegogo at the top of the page.

Please share my book with 5 friends, family members, or co-workers who you think would enjoy it via text or direct message on social media.

Thank you so much for of all of your love and support!

Thanks again,
Bartholomew Perez

story:
Market Your Art Like A Rogue Artist

Don't follow the cookie-cutter courses that most art marketing "mentors" love to pawn off on artists who are desperate to understand marketing. This book is going to go against the grain of most typical artist marketing courses. I am going to defy the standard and go rogue and hopefully show you that marketing is not this mysterious thing that is beyond your understanding. My hope is that by the end of reading this book you will find that the most powerful, one of a kind, and creative marketing can be fun and part of your unique creative journey.

Changes made to this campaign means that you can get not one but two full books plus the workbook.

HERE ARE THE BOOKS AND THE BONUS THANK YOU STUFF I'LL BE SENDING YOU:

TIMELINE: (Subject to change if we run into complications. We will keep you updated weekly.)

(I am aiming to get it all done sooner, but this ensures that I do not rush the process.)

September 29th - November 10th: Design Cover. (DONE)

September 29th - November 20th: Organize, And Edit Book Format. (DONE)

November 20th - February 28th: Writing And Research For Marketing & Money Book. Formatting Images, design poster. (DONE)

February 28th - June 20th: Writing, Images, And Final Edits On Marketing Book. Make all final edits on MONEY BOOK and JOURNAL.

June 20th - ORDER BOOKS, Materials, And Gifts.

June 21st - PRE-RELEASE DIGITAL COPIES OF BOOKS (PDF) TO SUPPORTERS

JULY 2021 - SHIP BOOKS OUT TO INDIEGOGO SUPPORTERS (PRE-RELEASE)

JULY - SEPT: Record and format All audiobooks.

SEPT 2021: RELEASE AUDIOBOOKS TO INDIEGOGO SUPPORTERS (PRE-RELEASE)

NOV - DEC 2021: BOOKS AND AUDIOBOOKS RELEASE TO PUBLIC

THE ROGUE MONEY BOOK AND AUDIOBOOK EXTRA

Originally I intended to Make The Marketing And Money concepts just one book, but due to the fact that the book is already going to be giant, I am separating both concepts into separate books. If You want to add it on please do. Book will tackle money mentality, pricing, best practices, and more. This add on is for the softcover book and Audio MP3. You can add it as an add-on during checkout. That book will be released in March 2021 along with the audiobook. 

NEW COVER DESIGNS :)

Special Creative Editions For Indiegogo

Your books will be signed special release editions for our Indiegogo supporters, so there will be a little extra in your books from Klee and me that the general public will not be privy to when the book is officially launched in January (such as signed posters, bookmarks, and anything else we think is fun). The hardcover books are limited special edition color copies. These will only be available for this campaign, so anyone with a color copy can show off how awesome their color copy is.

The Rogue Artist’s Marketing Brainstorming Journal is a workbook for keeping track of and brainstorming your own rogue marketing and money techniques.  

 

*I forgot to list the marketing workbook in the PREORDER LIMITED EDITION COLOR HARDCOVER... But it is included as one of the items, unfortunately, I can't change it on the tier.

 

Story of My Books

The Rogue Artist series is meant to challenge the perspective and story of the starving artist, build confidence in your ability to promote yourself and your art, and to build trust in your own unique way of approaching your career as an artist... and human. I intertwined my amusing art career journey with the stories of other creative mavericks who inspired me to pave my own way. I talk about all the harebrained ideas that worked despite the naysayers. I share with you real stories of failure, mistakes, wins, successes, and all the things that lead us from having nothing to being able to hang out in a studio in our pajamas all day. 

 

In this book (The Rogue Artist’s Guide To Rogue Marketing) I’ll talk about all the marketing rules in the art world and how I broke them in order to succeed my own way. I offer down to earth, authentic, fun, and simple advice, which can sometimes be a little hard to hear but may fire you up.

This is the second book in a series of books on how to live life as a successful rogue in the art world. 

Who Am I?

My name is Rafi Perez and I am the author of The Rogue Artist Series, I make my living as an artist, musician, and creative. My wife Klee (who will be mentioned a lot in this book) Is an artist, jeweler, and musician. I wrote this book because I had always been obsessed with living as a creative, but spent the majority of my life avoiding it because I was too afraid to fail at something I loved. After having spent 12 years in the "comfort" of the corporate world, I left and ventured on a creative journey that pushed me beyond what I thought was possible. I started with absolutely nothing to my name, and over the course of a decade, I have built an amazing life as a full-time creative. 

 

I have spent the last ten years collecting notes, documenting the process, testing out different theories, challenging the status quo, learning rules, and breaking them in order to create myself as a full-time artist who runs his own studio and lives life by his own rules. These books are a collection of that experience thus far. Starting with the Survival Guide, and then moving on to the mysterious world of marketing and money as an artist. 

 

My hope is that, in reading this book, you will understand how to grow your personal creative brand as an artist while still having fun. I hope to instill the same passion and excitement that I have for life and being a creative human in this modern world full of opportunities. Ultimately I want you to see this book as a tool or guide to help you understand how to grab the machete and cut your own trail through the dense forest that is the artist's life. 

 

I want to secretly inspire you to blaze your own trail as brightly as any awesome human can... and turn away from marketing courses that want you to follow the cookie-cutter crowd. If you’re not into that, I want you to enjoy the fun stories, cliff hangers, ridiculous situations, and all-out creative conundrums that fill the pages of this book.

 

In this book, you’ll learn that the advice of most “art marketing experts” in the art world is crap and outdated… Luckily I’m not an expert, so who knows what kind of crazy shit is going to come out of my mouth. I will, however, point out several rules from people in marketing and lay out the flaws in their thinking and philosophy. I will also talk about what worked… They are not ALL bad.

 

The main thing I will touch on throughout this book is the power of having the right mindset in approaching potentially disastrous situations or circumstances as you traverse your creative journey into the unknown. I will also talk about dealing with the naysayers who lurk in dark corners… or your house. 

 

You will love this book if you are a casual hobbyist, a fine artist, a musician, a creative, an artist looking to up their game, or you are simply a human who breathes air. Especially if you are curious about ways to venture out and do your own thing in life. The Rogue Artist’s Guide To Rogue Marketing And Money is a non-fiction book that speaks to rebels, non-conformists, artists, creative humans, and content creators who are looking at growing their ability to pursue their dreams and make them a reality... their own way. 

The Book - The Rogue Artist's: Guide To Rogue Marketing

Outline - TABLE OF CONTENTS- (This May Change As I Put This Book Together and more may be added)

WHY I WROTE THIS BOOK 

Artists Marketing Programs Are All Selling The Same Shtick. 

What I hope You Get Out Of This Book.

THE UGLY TRUTH ABOUT THIS BOOK 

Why Many Artists Fail.

This IS NOT Easy, But It Is Simple.

You Have To Figure Out YOUR Way.

You Are Going To Have To Avoid Being Unremarkable And Safe.

Coloring In The Lines Eventually Leads To Boring But Is Safe.

This Is Going To Take Time But It Will Be Sustainable.

TRADITIONAL MARKETING WRAPPED IN A BOW

List Of Traditional Marketing Rules To Break As A Rogue

ROGUE MARKETING? I HATE THE WORD MARKETING

What If I Don’t Like Marketing?

Marketing Is Not A Gimmick, Or Advertising, It Is Life.

Force Feeding The Masses By Cramming It Down Their Eye And Ear Sockets.

Getting Over My Guilt Of Being An Artist

What If My Art Sucks? What If I Suck? What If I’m Not Ready?

Create Your Own Niche Target Market

THINKING LIKE A MARKETING ROGUE

You Can’t Make People Listen, But You Can Let People Find You.

Human Behavior Is A Mixed Bag Of Farts.

Why Playing It Safe Or Being “Normal” Is Bullshit

Just Be You, Not False Confidence.

Having A Plan For Action, Put A Plan Together, Here’s How.

Who Am I Creating For? Who Are My Peeps?

Learned Helplessness And Other Fascinating CrapTurds 

For Every 1 Success There May Be 10 Failures.

Be A Story Teller In Everything You Do, NOT A LIAR

Haters Gonna Hate, Critics Gonna Criticise… Just let them.

People That Will Buy From You Are Humans, Not Just Walking Wallets.

Strategic Timing, Don’t Just Vomit All Your Stuff Out There Right Away.

Your Art Collector Peeps Are Your Rogue Sales Force.

You Don’t Have To Be Annoyingly Outrageous Just Be Rogue.

Don’t Be A Balloon, Be A Human. Don’t Get Deflated Or Inflated. 

Problem-Oriented VS Solution-Oriented When The Shit Hits The Fan.  

Taking Yourself Seriously Can Really Be A Drag.

Being An ARTROVERT.

Marketing Like A Rogue - Keeping It Real, Keeping It Fun

BEING FELICIFIC BECAUSE DESPERATION MAKES YOU LOOK DESPERATE

Everything You Put Out There Is A Reflection Of You.

Just Be Who You Are And Put It Out There.

Desperation Makes You Dumb And You Don’t See The Opportunities. 

Everyone You Meet Or Interact With Can Be Part Of Your Team, Collectors, Or Both.

Unicorn With Rainbow Shooting Out Of His Butt

All Publicity Is Good Publicity... But Not Is All Great.

52 ROGUE MARKETING IDEAS TO TRY OUT

List With Explanations.

THE ELEVATOR PITCH

Social Experiments Are Fun

ROGUE ONLINE AND OTHER INDOOR STUFF

Stay consistent With Social Media, What Does That Mean?

Make a website (if you haven’t already)

The Spiderweb Of Destiny

MOMMA SAID KNOCK YOU OUT 

Don’t Just Punch Someone In The Face Once, Give Them A Combination

Why Just Paying For Adds Doesn’t Work

JUST FACHUNKING DO IT ALREADY

10 ROGUE MARKETING TIPS IN A NUTSHELL

 

 Why Crowdfunding? 

To be honest with you, I went back and forth with this decision for some time. This book isn't aimed at the mass market - it's aimed at a specific type of person: the kind of person that wants to be inspired to blaze their own trail and embrace their creative wild side.

 

We have a following on YouTube, our blog, and podcast, that listens to me ramble on about life and being a full-time creative, and this book is written with those rabble-rousers in mind. I think a traditional publishing house would be confused by the content which is not the traditional art career crap you find at the bookstore. 

 

I want to achieve my vision for the book with as much creative control over the final product as possible. This means that I need your help to make the physical product a reality. The project goal will cover the initial print run, and enable me to place a well-produced, exclusive crowd-funded edition of The Rogue Artist's: Survival Guide in your hands... you rabble-rouser you. 

 

Individual Items are:

Ebook Digital Download - A PDF Digital Copy Of My Book. (Will also be available on Kindle when released) 

 

Audiobook Mp3 Download  - A Digital Download Audio Copy Of My Book Read By The Author. (Will be available on Audible when released)

 

Rogue Marketing Handbook - A companion workbook journal that can be used with the book. - A PDF Digital Copy and softcover will be available as well.

 

The Rogue Artist’s Guide To Rogue Marketing - Paperback Book - Signed Black and White Paperback (Softcover).

 

Limited Edition Hard Cover - Full-Color Hardcover Limited Edition Copy Of My Book. There will be a limited supply available.

 

The Rogue Artist Series of Books - 2 Signed Paperback (Softcover) Copy Of My Books and the Companion book.

 

Book Club Meeting - You will receive 4 signed Paperback copies of my book (made out to the recipients of book club).

 

All signed shipped items will include bookmarks, cards, posters, and other fun materials. 

What I Need & What You'll Get

This book will be published via self-publishing through Rafi And Klee Studios. I set up the pre-order tiers to help cover the costs for publishing my book. Money raised will go towards the following:

 

Publishing All Books - I have calculated the lowest possible price for advanced pre-order sales which need to be ordered in bulk along with shipping cost from the printer and to the recipient. 

An Editor - I will work with to revise and publish my manuscript for the draft book.  (Pre Order Release Date) January 2nd, 2020, or earlier.

The Cover Design Of My Book - I’ll be designing something based on the design in the mockup, and consulting with a professional book artist. Ultimately, I'll be designing this mostly myself, so the cost won't be great, but I need advice from a professional. 

The Layout Design for the interior of my book (Physical Copy, Ebook Formats)

Copyediting For My Book - to help polish the grammar (which I really need) and spelling prior to publication, and to help make the book more interesting. 

Organizing And Structuring My Book - I'll need time to finish the final draft once changes are made and new sections are added. I will need the time, and additional finances will help me take a break from the studio and focus on the book and meet all my deadlines.

Proofing - I'll be going back and forth with the printer and ordering several proofs. 

The Launch & Promotion Efforts For My Book - when I ultimately publish in the winter.

Designing And Ordering Insert Materials - For all the additional digital cards and fun materials that will be included with your book.

Packaging Materials - In order to ship everything out in time, I'll have to preorder boxes and other packaging materials that can only be purchased in bulk.

I am also offering some exclusive rewards for people who pre-order my book via this campaign:

 

You will receive a personally signed copy of my book when I publish an early release on January 2nd.

A personal, handwritten thank you note for pre-ordering my book.

Your Name will appear in a Special Acknowledgements section of my book (“with Special Thanks To”).

Early access to the introduction of my book and my entire manuscript, with the opportunity to review it and give me early feedback, before the official release date in January.

I will keep you up to date on the process at least once a week up until the early release of the book. I will stay in touch after the book release if you would like.

The opportunity to help give me feedback and be involved in selecting poster designs. 

 

Risks & Challenges

 

The biggest challenge with publishing a book is finding the time to organize, rewrite, and finish drafts.  It will be the back and forth between the copywriters, printer, editors and myself that will take the most time, effort, and money. I am hoping that we get enough pre-orders to give me the finances I need to be able to use that time and additional expense budget to work through any problems that may arise.

 

Mailing the books on time will also be paramount and brings with it all kinds of challenges. I have eliminated this risk by building into the campaign the packaging and shipping costs of your signed copies to you within each pre-order tier.

 

The risk of delivering the pre-sale copies of my book is contingent on the printer we use. I will be working closely with them to make sure we get the earliest possible ship date of the signed book copy to you. The plan is to have the books in my hands no later than January 29th, Klee and I will sign them and package and they should all ship out the following week.

 

I will keep you up-to-date as my book hits each key milestone and publishes. You will know when the copies of my book you pre-ordered are expected to ship ahead of time.

 

If I do not reach my goal, I will continue with the pre-release launch on for the physical copy of the books, but the audiobook may be pushed back to March. 

 

 

 

Other Ways You Can Help

Some people just can't contribute, but that doesn't mean they can't help:

 

Please Share my Pre-sale Campaign on Facebook, Twitter, and LinkedIn with your friends, family, and network. Please use #therogueartist and tag me (@rafiwashere) 

 

You can easily share my Pre-Sale Campaign Page via Indiegogo at the top of the page.

 

Please share my book with 5 friends, family members, or co-workers who you think would enjoy it. Please do this as a text message or direct message on social media.

 

Thank you so much for all of your love and support!

To purchase my last book, plus a 12 hour commentary go to https://rafiandklee.com/shop/books/

 

You Are Amazing!!!

 

-Rafi

 

www.rafiandklee.com

 

www.therogueartist.com
