story:
Hi Everyone! Thanks for checking out my campaign!

 

Short Summary

 

Poison frogs are popular pets all over the world because of their beautiful coloration and a broad variety of stunning behaviors. Although most of them are relatively easy to keep, there are some things about husbandry that can be improved. Observations from their natural habitats turned out to be essential for the way we keep and breed these stunning animals. This is where I want to contribute my part:

Having spent over 20 years keeping and breeding over 50 species of poison frogs and the last few years working with them in both the field and the laboratory, I would love to share my knowledge and experience. My focus will lie on Colombian poison frog species, especially on the spectacular egg feeding Oophaga sp., which are highly endangered in the Wild. 

Through writing and publishing, I want to contribute to improving animal well-being, help improve ex-situ conservation projects, assure that my passion for frogs and the efforts will inspire fellow hobbyists and that it serves as a guide for both beginners to professionals.

A must have for everyone interested in keeping amphibians!

 

The manuscript will contain the following topics: 

(Order and structure might change a bit, but not topics. Best case I add stuff, but won’t take things out!)

 

  1. Prelude
  2. The secrets of husbandry
    1. Hygiene
    2. The vivarium
    3. Light vs. darkness, cold vs. heat
    4. Breeding frogs
    5. The toolbox
  3. Diet
    1. Feeder insects
    2. Nutrients: From minerals to pigments to vitamins
    3. The importance of gut loading
    4. Do’s and don’ts!
  4. Bromeliads
    1. Observations from the wild
    2. Water chemistry and implications
    3. Cultivation of bromeliads
  5. Tales from the Wild
    1. The Biogeographic Chocó:
      1. Andinobates
      2. Dendrobates
      3. Epipedobates
      4. Oophaga
    2. The Colombian Amazon
      1. Allobates
      2. Ameerega
      3. Ranitomeya
    3. The Guyana Shield
      1. Dendrobates
      2. Extra toad stories: Atelopus
  6. Guest Chapter: Conservation by Ivan Lozano of Tesoros de Colombia 
  7. Closing remarks
     

The manuscript will cover the species that I have seen in the wild and observations from each biogeographic region that I have visited. It will contain trip reports written in my personal style with my sort of humor, and have detailed glossaries as well as contain brief summaries that will be provided for each topic. 

 

 

It is an honor for me to have my friend and conservationist idol contributing to the book! So for those of you who don`t know Ivan lozano, here is a brief overview of what he is doing:

Ivan Lozano is a Colombian animal scientist and conservationist whose principal interest is to develop practical solutions to stop species extinctions in his country Colombia.

Ivan has been an International Wildlife Management Consultant for two decades and university lecturer for 8 years.

He created, and is the head of, two revolutionary conservation projects in Colombia:
La Reserva Biopark and Tesoros de Colombia Sustainable Farm.

The Biopark is a conservation themed park located close to Bogotá, where thousands of people, mainly children, get to understand their role in ecosystem and species conservation and welfare. It serves as a sanctuary for hundreds of wild animals rescued from the illegal traffic and has a leading ecosystem restoration project of high Andean forests.

Tesoros de Colombia is a project intended to protect the poison frog species which are being smuggled out of Colombia by offering a legal and ethic alternative to this demand and breed enough animals to start reintroduction programs. Also, Tesoros wants to create reserves for some species and looks to find economic alternatives to the communities that will protect this species once reintroduced.

 

What I need

 

Roughly €3000 will support me in finishing writing, self-publishing both digital and paperback forms. Everything raised above that goal will be inverted in quality of the prints and additional content!

 

When will it be published and why I am self-publishing

 

I am aiming to publish late summer 2020, preferably end of August.

This campaign is for an english version of the manuscript! A additional german version would be nice, but I would have to see how things go in terms of time and effort for the english version.

I love to have control over all processes and make sure that everything lives up to my standards in terms of quality and style. I will have and will seek input from professionals though, as I understand that publishing a book is a complex and time consuming process.

A whooping estimated 35% of the book is already written and/or prepared. So that at current pace, I should complete the first version of the manuscript by the end of January 2020. 

 

 

 

 

Parallel to all processes, design and layout will be aligned with the requirements for the print.
After that, layout, editing and complementary material such as maps, frogs and other illustrations will consume the majority of the available time.

I am aiming for 50-75 pages, both sides printed, two-column text with large photographs, illustrations and maps. Format A4 (30cm x 21cm) for both the softcover and hardcover versions.

This edition will be limited to maximum 50 of each available style (Softcover magazine, Hardcover Books). All signed and numbered. 

Due to the limited number of printed versions available they all automatically turn into something special, as it is going to be a one time project I do not intend to further commercialize.

Free PDF versions of the husbandry parts will be made available to whomever might be interested in ordering to assure the following:

 

The Impact
 

The manuscript is aimed at improving animal well-being in terms of standards for hobbyists and professionals. As I described earlier, some new observations have not made it into the hobby yet and as with everything, there is room to improve. I am convinced I can contribute significantly to that cause.

 

Risk and Challenges
 

As a person with Young onset Parkinson’s disease, I might have a few bad days every once in a while. So time will have to be very well spent and thoroughly organized without overwhelming me in the process.

As english is not my native language, though I’d say I am pretty ok at it, I intend to distribute part of the funds raised towards getting proof reading and editing done professionally.

 

Other Ways You Can Help
 

Share, share, share. Everywhere and all over social media :-)

 

About Me

My name is Andreas Zarling, I’m a biologist, traveler, enthusiast photographer and passionate story teller! 

… and a long term (really close to 20 years) frog addict. Yes, a frog addict! We exist :-)

For as long as I can remember, frogs have been the most interesting creatures on this planet for me. Almost 15 years after for the first time setting foot in frog territory in South America, a good friend recently approached me asking why I haven’t published my stories and observations as a book yet. After a brief moment reflecting on that, I decided that it is a great idea!

My „frogger“ Curriculum vitae

  • I am a Herpetologist (M.Sc)
  • Kept and bred 50+ poison frog species and managed laboratory frog populations for a few years
  • Have given twelve talks about frogs to international audiences so far!
  • Co-produced and wrote two documentaries on poison frogs!
  • Spent over five years living in Colombia and Ecuador studying poison frogs in the field!
  • Over six years as a scientific advisor for an Ex situ breeding program for poison frogs!

As I described earlier, some new observations have not made it into the hobby yet and as with everything, there is room to improve. I am convinced I can contribute significantly to that cause. Risk and Challenges As a person with Young onset Parkinson’s disease, I might have a few bad days every once in a while. So time will have to be very well spent and thoroughly organized without overwhelming me in the process.As english is not my native language, though I’d say I am pretty ok at it, I intend to distribute part of the funds raised towards getting proof reading and editing done professionally. Other Ways You Can Help Share, share, share. Everywhere and all over social media :-) About MeMy name is Andreas Zarling, I’m a biologist, traveler, enthusiast photographer and passionate story teller! … and a long term (really close to 20 years) frog addict. Yes, a frog addict! We exist :-)For as long as I can remember, frogs have been the most interesting creatures on this planet for me. Almost 15 years after for the first time setting foot in frog territory in South America, a good friend recently approached me asking why I haven’t published my stories and observations as a book yet. After a brief moment reflecting on that, I decided that it is a great idea!My „frogger“ Curriculum vitae
I am a Herpetologist (M.Sc)
Kept and bred 50+ poison frog species and managed laboratory frog populations for a few years
Have given twelve talks about frogs to international audiences so far!
Co-produced and wrote two documentaries on poison frogs!
Spent over five years living in Colombia and Ecuador studying poison frogs in the field!
Over six years as a scientific advisor for an Ex situ breeding program for poison frogs!

story:
Short Summary

In September, 2016, we tragically lost our friend and brother, Keith Robinson, known affectionately to most of us as ‘Keef’.

Keith was the founder and driving force behind Desert Storm from its early days putting on the first free parties in Glasgow and the West of Scotland through to his place at the forefront of the fight against 1994’s Criminal Justice Act and the Reclaim the Streets Campaign, and on to his amazing journey to Bosnia in 1995.

Over the two and a half decades of his involvement in the free party and techno scenes, Keef inspired and influenced so many of us across Europe. His organisational skills were almost as legendary as his capacity for decadent levels of partying, but he was also very much an innovator and someone determined to bring a sense of social conscience to what was often a purely hedonistic scene.

At the time of his death, Keith was in the process of having his life and experiences turned into a book from his often manic notes. It’s taken nearly three years to gather these notes together and to get the blessing of his family to resurrect this project and we are now ready to take it to the next stage.

We aim to publish the book before Xmas.

We appreciate we are in an era of austerity and authoritarianism, so please, donate only what you can afford.

 

“You might stop the party, but you can’t stop the future!”

What We Need & What You Get

Keith's manuscript is pretty disjointed in places, and some of the timeline is out of sync. We also want to add to his story and also feature anecdotes and memories from the many people whose lives Keith influenced.

 We have his original writing partner, Iain Donnelly, who had known Keef since 1991, back on board and already working on the manuscript. But it is going to take a lot of work, and this initial part of the fundraising will cover Iain's costs as he works on the book over the next 5-6 months. It also covers the fees and transfer charges for Indiegogo 

The Impact

Keith was always at the forefront of the free party scene and has been a huge influence on many people. We believe his story needs to be recorded for posterity, to remember the many moments of joy and happiness he brought to friends and acquaintances, and to stand as an inspiration to a new generation.

Other Ways You Can Help

We know times are hard. If you can only donate a small amount, even that helps. If you can't afford to donate, please share the campaign on as the wider audience it has, the quicker we reach our target.

story:
The Secret Kitchen Book

An Art recipe book ~ Intuitive eating

 

This campaign is to support the final Print and remaining costs for this Book to enter this world 

My fascination with natural health began long before I spent many years studying it. As a child, growing up in vibrant fields of the mountains of Czech Republic, which were abundant with herbs and wildflowers, folk remedies and nature, I discovered the power of plant medicine and its healing properties and it has never left me since. 

Fast forward to today, I have spent many years teaching people how to regain and reignite their health through my naturopathy clinics where I practise with Bioresonace - body natural life synergetics.

I have been faced with hundreds of patients who suffer from endless maladies-  body dissatisfaction, disordered eating, confusion around eating, obsession with weight, obesity, anorexia and all because they have forgotten the ability to tune into their intrinsic knowledge of their own bodies and how to connect with the natural world and use it as a healing tool, as it has been done for thousands of years.

For this reason (and because of the persistent encouragement of my clients) I have decided to create “The Secret Kitchen Book” which will help you to understand how our bodies work together with the power of nature and it cycles. I would like this book to be an inspiration to shift us from rule based eating and living to intuitive eating and then more authentic living.  

Content of the Book

I will address in each chapter the many cycles of nature which are reflections of our inner body power and cycles, including the moon cycle. For example regular exposure to waxing and waning moonlight has even been known to regulate ovulation and menstrual irregularities. This is because most people innately have a pretty clear understanding of the seasons of the year and perhaps even of eating summer produce in summer and autumn produce in autumn. This will take each chapter into deeper understandings of the seasonal cycles, using folk remedies as examples.

My aim with this book is to allow you a golden moment, where you set aside all technology, which numbs our inner cycles, and instead give yourself the gift of authentic mindful natural health, through my recipes. I also hope reading “The Secret Kitchen Book” will bring back memories from your childhood: memories of smells, forgotten tastes and simple happiness. 

All photos in this book are taken in order to awaken your true innate self and hopefully inspire you on a great and beautiful adventure…

The Secret Kitchen book & Self publishing

As mentioned above, this cook book is an Art/passion project, its not just an ordinary  "Cook book".

Therefore, I didn't want to go through commercial publishing and compromise for the book design, in line with my Naturopathic beliefs and values ~ it is the quality not the quantity. More so, I would like to support local Eco businesses and community alongside this project. Depending on the success of the campaign, I will donate a percentage of this book to support local farmers in need through https://aussiehelpers.org.au

The Book Style

A coffee table hard cover book with over 180 pages and over 50 recipes, printed in Sydney to the highest quality assurance standards. It is a collection of art in many forms: plant inspired recipes with sensory notes and naturopathic insights, self taken film photography, design, poetry by Lea Fernandez and more...

The book will 

- Printed for this campaign in a run of 250 limited edition copies. First 150 books will be     delivered this year December latest for Xmas, rest in January - be fast!!

- Be printed and published following eco rules

- Push the boundaries of a commercial cookbook design and printing

- Feature an exposed spine, hand stitching and recycled paper

- Feature Self taken film photographs and digital food photographs collected over many years in my travels and home cooking

The book is sense itself, designed to represent each of the senses:  Sound, Touch, Smell, Sight... Each book from the campaign will be scented with essential oils and be beautiful to the touch

 

After many months of tasting, passion, happiness, creativity & some tears, this book is just about to enter the world. The funding for this project is to support the final printing stage and remaining expenses.

 

Where your money will go

Once we reach our goal, we will proceed publishing 250 pieces of the Book.

If we reach more than the goal amount, the money will go towards a second reprint of the book. 

There is nothing more rewarding than supporting local Eco businesses, so let's reach the goal so we can print locally and spread the word for THE HEALING POWER of nature to the corners of the world where it may have been forgotten. 

This is also an opportunity to pre order the book for a discounted price and get yourself special packages For Naturopathic consultations (see Perks) to  deepen your body knowledge and understanding of your own healing path and visit me in my Bronte clinic... more info http://www.thesecretkitchen.net

~ Any contribution is a good contribution,  sharing this link on your page, spreading the word by mouth... letting people know in any form about this project is very appreciated. It will bring reward to this crowdfunding with a new special exchange of energy ~ at the end, this is all what we are made of ~

story:
Hello, my name is Nnamdi.

My name is Nnamdi Nwaezeapu and I am the author of Doctor, Lawyer, Engineer: How to pursue your dreams without giving your parents a heart attack. I wrote this book simply because I needed it a few years ago when trying to decide whether to pursue my interests in entrepreneurship or make my parents proud and focus on law school.


My hope is that, in reading this book, you will discover how to chart your own path without sacrificing the success and economic stability that your parents so desire. In this book, I hope to instill in you the same sort of passion and excitement that I have for building a fulfilling life. Ultimately, I want you to see this book as a tool to help you design your ideal life, all while keeping your parents from experiencing existential anguish.


Here's what you'll be reading about:

In this book, you'll learn about employment outcomes for the legal, medical, and engineering professions, as well as hear stories and strategies around cultivating your passions while managing the psychological and relational impacts of immigrant and first-gen culture.

  • You will read about Pierre LaGuerre, a first-generation immigrant from Haiti, who exchanged his parents dream of becoming a Neuroscientist at Harvard, to become a truck driver, and eventually going on to found a prominent tech startup
  • You will learn from Yvonne Orji, the comedian and actress in the above clip, who traded med school for a career in comedy, and eventually ended up as a main character on popular HBO show, Insecure.
  • You will also read papers from researchers like psychologist, Mary Odafe, who has conducted extensive studies on the psychological impacts of immigrant parenting styles on various psychopathologies such as maladaptive perfectionism.

 

You will love this book if:

  • You are unsure about law, medicine, or engineering as a profession.
  • You are a parent or mentor trying to help someone make a decision about what to do with their future.
  • You want to pursue your dreams, but you are unsure how to do so without bringing heaping amounts of shame to yourself and to your family.

 

The Book - Doctor, Lawyer, Engineer: How to pursue your dreams without giving your parents a heart attack.

Doctor, Lawyer, Engineer  is a non-fiction book that speaks to those who want to build a fulfilling life and to their parents and mentors who, many for the first time, are looking at how they can help, and whether they should.
 

What I Need & What You'll Get

This book will be published with New Degree Press. I set up the pre-order tiers to help cover the costs for publishing my book. Money raised will go towards the following:

  • The Editor I will work with to revise and publish my manuscript in December, 2020.
  • The Cover Design of my Book - the mock-ups you see currently are a placeholder!
  • The Layout Design for the interior of my book (Physical Copy, E-book Formats)
  • The Copy editing for My Book - to make help polish the grammar and spelling prior to publication
  • The Launch & Promotion Efforts for my book - when I ultimately publish this Winter.

When I pre-sell 120 copies of my book, I will publish. When I pre-sell 150 copies of my book, I will also publish a hardcover edition. When I pre-sell 200 copies of my book, I will publish a hardcover edition and an audiobook.

I am also offering some exclusive rewards for people who pre-order my book now:

  • You will receive a personally signed copy of my book when I publish
  • A Personal, handwritten thank you note for pre-ordering my book
  • Your Name will appear in a Special, Acknowledgements Section of my book (“with Special Thanks to”)
  • Early access to the Introduction of my Book and my entire manuscript, with the opportunity to review it and give me early feedback
  • The opportunity to help give me feedback and be involved in selecting my cover
  • I will do a book topic/workshop seminar where I will share experience the experiences of writing my book
  • And more...

 

About The Author

My name Is Nnamdi Nwaezeapu and I am passionate about helping people live happier and healthier lives. I am from Washington, DC, I hold a BA in Psychology from Columbia University, and I am currently pursuing my interests in entrepreneurship as an Account Manager for Munich-based startup company, Mindshine. I also run a small online community called the University of Good where (you guessed it) I help imperfect people learn how to live happier and healthier lives (see: universityofgood.com).

I am the child of Nigerian and Bahamian immigrants. Like many children of immigrants, my parents impressed upon me, both subtly and overtly, that the Ivy league was my future and that a career in law would be a great way to earn a living, to earn them social standing, and to earn myself their love and affection. But after getting into Columbia Law School (with a scholarship) and still feeling unfulfilled, I sought out answers about what I should do. Aside from the occasional blog post, there was no real help to be found. So I wrote this book to solve this problem.

Now, it is important to note that despite the fact that I will be a published author in December, it is very apparent that my family largely still considers me to be a failure. Okay maybe not a failure, but you get the idea.

Thus, while I still love them very much, I would greatly appreciate your support in helping to make this book be a success. For their sake, and mine.

For more information you can connect with Nnamdi by email, instagram, twitter, and linkedin.

Risks & Challenges

The biggest challenge with publishing a book is delivering the finished book to the backer, specifically my mailing of the book to you. I have eliminated this risk by building into the campaign the mailing and shipping costs of your signed copies to you within each pre-order tier.

The risk of delivering the pre-sale copies of my book is contingent on the publisher we use. I will be working closely with New Degree Press to make sure we get the earliest possible ship date of the signed book copy to you. We will keep all pre-sale backers up-to-date as my book hits each key milestone and publishes. You will know when the copies of my book you pre-ordered are expected to ship.

Other Ways You Can Help

Some people just can't contribute, but that doesn't mean they can't help:

Please Share my Pre-sale Campaign on Facebook, Twitter, and LinkedIn with your friends, family and network. Please use #doctorlawyerengineer and tag me as well as my publisher, New Degree Press so we can help amplify your efforts.

You can easily share my Pre-Sale Campaign Page via Indiegogo at the top of the page

Please share my book to 5 friends, family members, or co-workers who you think would enjoy it. Please do this as a text message or Direct Message on social media.

Thank you so much for of all of your love and support!

Thanks again,
Nnamdi

story:
Story of my book:

Destination Space by Rob Kasper is a book that provides a comprehensive, easy-to-read, and exciting overview of our quest to become a multi-planetary species. Covering every aspect imaginable, from a Martian colony to a floating city in Venus to the myriad of benefits that space travel will bring to life on Earth, this book will show you how you can become a meaningful part of the conversation on space exploration.

My name is Rob Kasper and I am the author of Destination Space. I wrote this book because I hope to instill the same sort of passion and excitement that I have for the future of space exploration in you!

My hope is that, in reading this book, you will discover that becoming a multi-planetary species is not just an ambitious goal, but a necessary one. Then ultimately, I want you to see this book as a tool to help you spark fascinating conversations on space exploration - conversations that are critical to ensuring that the missions of tomorrow leave the drawing board and launch into the stars.

In this book, you'll learn how to have meaningful conversations on space without a doctorate degree in astrophysics. You'll be able to refute common objections to space exploration and demonstrate to others the importance of the missions of tomorrow. Among other things, you'll learn:

  • The curiosity and sense of exploration that have propelled humanity to greatness. Through exercises such as understanding humanity's birthday on the Cosmic Calendar, you will discover that these instincts are within you too!
  • The threats to humankind's presence on Earth and how the myriad of past, current, and future missions around our Solar System are redefining how we understand these threats.
  • How the financing of space exploration is largely misunderstood and how many of our favorite science fiction novels, tv shows, and movies are not as far from reality as we may think.
  • What a Martian colony may look like, what a floating city in Venus may look like, and what other destinations humanity may one day call home.
You will love this book if you are excited about the future of humanity, are incessantly curious, and love to have your mind blown.

Destination Space is a non-fiction book that speaks to space enthusiasts who are looking at the future of space exploration and the quest to become a multi-planetary species for the first time.

 

The Book - Destination Space

The book is written in 3 Parts....

1. Part One contains the introduction and two additional chapters. In Part 1, you will learn why humanity is on the brink of the next golden age of space exploration, why the quest to become a multi-planetary species is driven by the instincts that make us human, and why this ambition is necessary to ensure the survival of humanity. You will discover your innate sense of curiosity by learning humanity's birthday on the Cosmic Calendar, see how the sense of exploration that has propelled our species from the plains of Africa to the stars will drive us to become multi-planetary, and understand the existential threats that could potentially cripple our species.

2. Part Two contains Chapters 3-6. In these chapters, you will be given a comprehensive overview of humanity's presence in space today. You will learn about the most important missions are currently operating in the stars in chapter 3, about the benefits that such missions are yielding to humanity on Earth in chapter 4, about how these missions are financed in chapter 5, and about how science fiction is playing a critical role in sparking enthusiasm for future missions in chapter 6. Part 2 will show you what would happen if NASA and the military swapped annual budgets, how going to space has changed astronauts view of the planet they call home, and how close humanity is to creating a real-life lightsaber!

3. Part Three contains Chapters 7-9. The final section of the book looks to the future of space exploration. Chapter 7 will bring you onto the first human colony on Mars and show you how the brave explorers of tomorrow will survive on our favorite cosmological neighbor. Chapter 8 will show you how Mars is not the only potential destination for humanity by taking you onto a floating city in the skies of Venus and onto trillion dollar asteroids. And finally, chapter 9 will provide you with additional resources specifically tailored to your age that will help you to learn more about space.

What I Need & What You'll Get

This book will be published with New Degree Press. I set up the pre-order tiers to help cover the costs for publishing my book. Money raised will go towards the following:

  • The Editor that I will work with to revise and publish my manuscript in July 2019.
  • The Cover Design of my book - the mockups you see currently are just a placeholder!
  • The Layout Design for the interior of my book (Physical Copy, Ebook Formats).
  • The Copyediting for my book - to help polish the grammar and spelling prior to publication.
  • The Launch & Promotion Efforts for my book - when I ultimately publish this in July 2019!
  • When I pre-sell 100 copies of my book, I will also publish an audiobook. When I pre-sell 200 copies of my book, I will publish a hardcover edition. I need your help to make this happen!
I am also offering some exclusive rewards for people who pre-order my book now:
  • You will receive a personally signed copy of my book when I publish.
  • A personal, handwritten thank you note for pre-ordering my book.
  • Your name will appear in a special Acknowledgements Section of my book (“...with special thanks to...”).
  • Early access to the Introduction of my book and my entire manuscript, with the opportunity to review it and give me early feedback.
  • The opportunity to help give me feedback and be involved in selecting my cover.
  • Access to a book topic and workshop seminar where I will share the experience of writing my book, so that you can learn how one day you can become an author too!

And more...

About the Author

Rob Kasper is the founder of Destination Space Productions, a creative medium designed to reach the next generation of space enthusiasts through platforms such as YouTube, Instagram, and Podcasts. Coming in the summer of 2019, Destination Space Productions will launch a book, podcast, and Instagram Account. Here, Case for Space Productions will provide a platform for sharing conversations with NASA astronauts, industry experts, and more.

While a passionate space enthusiast, Rob is certainly no astrophysicist. Ask him — he can barely explain e=mc^2. From an early age, he was fascinated by space exploration but didn't know how to learn a field typically reserved for rocket scientists. Inspired by the diverse content shared by space popularizers such as Dr. Neil deGrasse Tyson, Dr. Carl Sagan, and others, he embarked on a journey to create this book — a way for people like him to understand something complex like the cosmos.

For more information you can connect with Rob at robkasper15@gmail.com and LinkedIn (https://www.linkedin.com/in/rob-kasper-a90883130/).

Risks & Challenges

The biggest challenge with publishing a book is delivering the finished book to the backer, specifically my mailing of the book to you. I have eliminated this risk by building into the campaign the mailing and shipping costs of your signed copies to you within each pre-order tier.

The risk of delivering the pre-sale copies of my book is contingent on the publisher we use. I will be working closely with New Degree Press to make sure we get the earliest possible ship date of the signed book copy to you. We will keep all pre-sale backers up-to-date as my book hits each key milestone and publishes. You will know when the copies of my book you pre-ordered are expected to ship.

Other Ways You Can Help

Some people just can't contribute and THAT'S OKAY! That doesn't mean they can't help:

Please Share my Pre-Sale Campaign on Facebook, Twitter, and LinkedIn with your friends, family and network. Please use #DestinationSpace and tag me as well as my publisher, New Degree Press, so we can help amplify your efforts.

You can easily share my Pre-Sale Campaign Page via Indiegogo at the top of the page. I will share a link with you if needed.

Please share my book to five friends, family members, or co-workers who you think would enjoy it. A simple text message or direct message on social media can go a long way!

THANK YOU SO MUCH of all of your love and support! This has been an incredible journey and I am so excited to share my experience with you all.

Thanks again.

With love,
Rob Kasper
story_txt:
Story of my book:
Destination Space by Rob Kasper is a book that provides a comprehensive, easy-to-read, and exciting overview of our quest to become a multi-planetary species. Covering every aspect imaginable, from a Martian colony to a floating city in Venus to the myriad of benefits that space travel will bring to life on Earth, this book will show you how you can become a meaningful part of the conversation on space exploration.My name is Rob Kasper and I am the author of Destination Space. I wrote this book because I hope to instill the same sort of passion and excitement that I have for the future of space exploration in you!My hope is that, in reading this book, you will discover that becoming a multi-planetary species is not just an ambitious goal, but a necessary one. Then ultimately, I want you to see this book as a tool to help you spark fascinating conversations on space exploration - conversations that are critical to ensuring that the missions of tomorrow leave the drawing board and launch into the stars.In this book, you'll learn how to have meaningful conversations on space without a doctorate degree in astrophysics. You'll be able to refute common objections to space exploration and demonstrate to others the importance of the missions of tomorrow. Among other things, you'll learn:

The curiosity and sense of exploration that have propelled humanity to greatness. Through exercises such as understanding humanity's birthday on the Cosmic Calendar, you will discover that these instincts are within you too!
The threats to humankind's presence on Earth and how the myriad of past, current, and future missions around our Solar System are redefining how we understand these threats.
How the financing of space exploration is largely misunderstood and how many of our favorite science fiction novels, tv shows, and movies are not as far from reality as we may think.
What a Martian colony may look like, what a floating city in Venus may look like, and what other destinations humanity may one day call home.
You will love this book if you are excited about the future of humanity, are incessantly curious, and love to have your mind blown.Destination Space is a non-fiction book that speaks to space enthusiasts who are looking at the future of space exploration and the quest to become a multi-planetary species for the first time.

story:
¿Qué?

El cuaderno de Zineb es una novela corta ambientada en los años ochenta en la ciudad de Santa Cruz de Tenerife.

El profesor Gonzalo Arenas cuenta en primera persona, desde la perspectiva del narrador testigo, cómo fue su relación con algunos de los personajes del relato. Por un lado, está Zineb, una alumna árabe que ha llegado a las islas con su familia con el objetivo de buscarse la vida en un lugar mejor. Las clases de Educación Compensatoria a las que asiste deben servirle para encauzar su vida en el futuro, acceder a otros estudios superiores y llegar, si es posible, a la universidad. Sus ojos brillantes de color verde enamoran al profesor Gonzalo Arenas, el narrador que cuenta lo que va sucediendo a medida que avanza el curso.

La llegada de Julián Álvarez dará al traste con algunos de los objetivos que se había marcado el profesor Arenas. Julián Álvarez es un joven profesor, apuesto e inteligente, que proviene de la universidad, de donde lo han echado por algún turbio asunto. Es también fotógrafo y en los últimos meses ha disfrutado de una beca en La Habana, donde ha estudiado fotografía en la Escuela Internacional de Cine de San Antonio de los Baños, a unos kilómetros de la capital. La relación entre Gonzalo Arenas y Julián Álvarez se irá afianzando, pero también complicando, en la medida en que los dos pretenderán a la misma mujer, Carolina, una profesora de inglés del mismo instituto.

Poco a poco, la verdadera protagonista de la historia, Zineb, se irá mostrando ante el lector más allá de sus simples cuadernos de redacción, como una mujer que esconde un gran secreto.

¿Quiénes?

Tandaia es una editorial con voluntad de cambio, de dar la alternativa a autores que no la encuentran en otro lugar, con nuevas y refrescantes ideas como es el emplear una campaña preventa para valorar la aceptación y viabilidad de cada título.

De este modo eres tú, ahora que te estás planteando cómo colaborar, el que decide si la obra que te presentamos verá la luz pasando a formar parte de nuestro catálogo... porque consideramos al lector parte fundamental del proceso.

Hoy te presentamos a José Antonio Leal Canales.

Ha simultaneado el cultivo del relato breve y la novela corta, géneros a los que pertenecen «El Valbanera o la esperanza» (Premio Felipe Trigo, Universitas, 1987), «Cita en La Habana» (E.R.E., La Gaveta, 1998), «Maneras de morir» (Premio Rafael González Castell, Diputación de Badajoz, 2002), «La sal en los labios» (E.R.E, 2013), así como otros muchos relatos publicados en diferentes antologías y revistas.
            En cuanto a las novelas, ha publicado la novela negra Los pasos del camaleón (Imagine, 2005), El fuego y las cenizas (Imagine, 2008), obra con la que ganó el Premio Internacional de Novela Seseña,  El testimonio del becario (Algaida, 2009), con la que obtuvo el XIII Premio de novela Ciudad de Badajoz y La colombiana (Norbanova, 2016).
            Ha recibido varios premios de cuentos y relatos, como el Barcarola (1988), Miguel de Unamuno (1989), Emiliano Barral (1990), Mislata (1990) y Benasque (2009), entre otros.

¿Por qué?

Y por aquí una muestra de lo que encontraréis en sus páginas:

«Sus ojos me habían llamado la atención cuando pasaba lista el primer día de clase. No supe entonces, en el preciso instante, a qué otros ojos me recordaban. Fue algún tiempo después cuando caí en el parecido evidente. Sus ojos eran los mismos que los de Sharbat Gula, una niña afgana de apenas doce años, que Steve McCurry había fotografiado en el campamento de refugiados de Nasir Bagh durante la guerra contra la invasión soviética. Su imagen apareció en la portada de National Geographic en junio de 1985. Dieciocho años más tarde la fotografiaría de nuevo, tras una búsqueda ardua por el país de las montañas, último refugio de Bin Laden. Tenía ya treinta años cuando la encontró. Se había casado con un hombre también afgano y era madre de tres hijos. Parecía una mujer mayor, a pesar de que sus ojos seguían siendo los mismos. Sin el brillo de la infancia, pero los mismos. Sin la rebeldía descarada que proporciona el atrevimiento de la ingenuidad, pero aún sombreados con la pátina de la inquietud que siempre genera en la mirada la belleza. Aunque a la postre domesticados, al fin sometidos, amansados ante el rigor implacable de los años duros de la posguerra, subordinados a la autoridad incuestionable de un marido que habría consentido la fotografía seguramente a cambio de unos cuantos dólares.
           Pero no era de Sharbat Gula de quien quería hablar, sino de Zineb. Tenía los mismos ojos de Sharbat».

¿Cómo?

Para arrancar el proyecto nos hemos fijado como objetivo 880€; esta es la cantidad que recaudaríamos si alrededor de cincuenta mecenas se hiciesen, cada cual, con un ejemplar de esta primera edición.

  • Teniendo acceso a las galeradas de edición.
  • Recibiendo un ejemplar semanas antes de la salida al mercado de la obra.
  • Si bien, también podrías ver tu nombre en los agradecimientos aportando un poco más.

Los fondos recaudados, se utilizarán como ayuda para sacar adelante esta primera edición de El cuaderno de Zineb que saldría después a la venta.

Aviso para navegantes: La opción RESPALDAR es únicamente para realizar donaciones a la edición, por lo que no habrá comunicaciones posteriores en busca de datos de envío... cualquiera de las opciones válidas de reserva exige cumplimentar formulario para poder servir el pedido.

Además...

Sabemos que son tiempos difíciles, también nosotros los sufrimos, y es posible que no te encuentres en disposición de apoyarnos con tu mecenazgo en estos momentos... pero esperamos que si esto te ha llegado al alma, incluso si tal vez conoces en persona al autor, trates de difundir esta campaña (facebook, twitter, blogger, boca-oreja... ) para que alcancemos nuestra meta y José Antonio Leal Canales vea publicada su obra.

Gracias por vuestro tiempo.

Política de Privacidad

story:
Who are you, and what is this book about?

Great question! Here are the basic details:

  • My name is Lloyd Evans. I am a former Jehovah's Witness elder from the UK. I am 37 years old, and currently living in Croatia with my beautiful wife and daughter. I am Senior Editor of JWsurvey.org, which is aimed at providing a resource for Jehovah's Witnesses who are beginning to awaken from their indoctrination. JWsurvey currently attracts 110,000 visits per month. I also create videos for the "John Cedars" YouTube channel, which currently has over 10,000 subscribers.
  • My campaign aims to pay the final costs for getting my book The Reluctant Apostate into print. This book is very important to me because, not only does it document my story of growing up as a Witness and finally leaving the religion - it also provides readers with a candid history of the religion and up-to-date overview of its beliefs and practices.
  • By getting this book launched in January 2017 (or possibly earlier) there is a real chance that we can reach out to indoctrinated Jehovah's Witnesses and give them the information they need to break free of cultic undue influence. We can also help inoculate the wider public (the primary audience the book is written for) against ever getting entangled with the Watchtower organization, with its harmful policies (i.e. shunning, blood prohibition, child abuse mishandling).

I am hopeful that, with your help, this book will make a real difference!

What I Need & What You Get

I need to raise $1,470 to pay for the following:

  • $500 in fees for a friend who is in the process of creating a beautiful design for the book, so that it is visually-pleasing as well as content-rich.
  • $585 to cover the costs of an initial print-run of 100 books, including fuel to go collect the books directly from the printers.
  • $250 to buy 10 ISBN numbers to officially register this book and future editions/translations.
  • $135 to cover the total anticipated fees taken by Indiegogo and PayPal for the above amounts.

In exchange for helping me reach this goal, my backers can receive:

  • For a $5 donation (toward making the project happen): my appreciation!
  • For $19: an advance copy of The Reluctant Apostate (before it is released on Amazon).
  • For $25: a signed advance copy of The Reluctant Apostate (before it is released on Amazon).
  • For $45: a signed advance copy of The Reluctant Apostate (before it is released on Amazon) with the backer's name in the Acknowledgments.

Any excess funds pledged will go toward printing and mailing extra books for reviewers, promoting the book, and otherwise assisting with my activism work (including upgrading equipment, paying web hosting costs, and buying a new 12-month subscription to the SurveyMonkey service for the JWsurvey.org Global Survey of Jehovah's Witnesses).

If I do not reach my goal, any funds will go toward meeting what costs I can, and I will explore alternative ways of raising the remaining money.

The Impact

In case you are wondering why there is a need for this campaign, or what difference your contribution will make...

  • There are currently 8 million Jehovah's Witnesses worldwide, many of whom have been raised in their religion from birth and never exposed to information that objectively scrutinizes their beliefs. This book offers a thorough debunking of the main Witness teachings and practices. It even has "For Witnesses" boxes with key points for indoctrinated Witnesses to consider.
  • The organization behind the Witnesses is intent on spreading its influence and attracting more converts from among those never raised as Witnesses. This book will assist those with little or no knowledge of the religion to prepare against ever getting roped in to the faith, perhaps at a time when they are emotionally vulnerable (which is when cults are most effective at recruiting).
  • By backing this project, you are supporting someone with (1) the knowledge and experience to tackle the subject, (2) the determination to make this book as thorough, readable and enjoyable as it can possibly be, (3) an established track record in anti-cult activism, and (4) a large audience that can give the book the head start it needs to be successful.

Risks & Challenges

Whenever you involve multiple people in a project, there are bound to be risks. But I am being careful to only use the services of experienced colleagues known for their high standards. I also intend to check quality at every stage. For example, I will be ordering sample copies of The Reluctant Apostate from the printers to make sure the copies I will be sending out are printed to the same high standard I would expect. 

As for the book itself, a team of 10 editors, some of whom have professional editing experience, are helping me with checking the quality of the text and making sure the spelling, grammar and punctuation are all up to a suitable standard.

I have every confidence that the finished book will be enjoyed by many, and I take my duty to send out copies to my backers extremely seriously.

In short:

  • I am working with the right people, who are just as passionate about this project as I am.
  • I have extremely high standards for this book. I am not writing a book just for the sake of it - I want the finished article to make its mark on the planet and stand the test of time!
  • In the worst case scenario, I have other options for raising the needed funds. However, an Indiegogo campaign seems like the best way to let my supporters get involved and receive a special reward for their generosity.

Other Ways You Can Help

It might be that you are not in a position to order a book, or donate money. If so, you can still help me in the following ways:

  • You can share links to this Indiegogo campaign (or the trailer video) on Reddit, or on Facebook and Twitter. Doing this is ALWAYS appreciated!
  • You can spread the word among any friends, family or work colleagues who might be interested in reading the book, or backing the project.

However you decide to get behind the project, you have my sincere gratitude!
story_txt:
Who are you, and what is this book about?
Great question! Here are the basic details:

My name is Lloyd Evans. I am a former Jehovah's Witness elder from the UK. I am 37 years old, and currently living in Croatia with my beautiful wife and daughter. I am Senior Editor of JWsurvey.org, which is aimed at providing a resource for Jehovah's Witnesses who are beginning to awaken from their indoctrination. JWsurvey currently attracts 110,000 visits per month. I also create videos for the "John Cedars" YouTube channel, which currently has over 10,000 subscribers.
My campaign aims to pay the final costs for getting my book The Reluctant Apostate into print. This book is very important to me because, not only does it document my story of growing up as a Witness and finally leaving the religion - it also provides readers with a candid history of the religion and up-to-date overview of its beliefs and practices.
By getting this book launched in January 2017 (or possibly earlier) there is a real chance that we can reach out to indoctrinated Jehovah's Witnesses and give them the information they need to break free of cultic undue influence. We can also help inoculate the wider public (the primary audience the book is written for) against ever getting entangled with the Watchtower organization, with its harmful policies (i.e. shunning, blood prohibition, child abuse mishandling).

I am hopeful that, with your help, this book will make a real difference!

What I Need & What You Get
I need to raise $1,470 to pay for the following:

$500 in fees for a friend who is in the process of creating a beautiful design for the book, so that it is visually-pleasing as well as content-rich.
$585 to cover the costs of an initial print-run of 100 books, including fuel to go collect the books directly from the printers.
$250 to buy 10 ISBN numbers to officially register this book and future editions/translations.
$135 to cover the total anticipated fees taken by Indiegogo and PayPal for the above amounts.

In exchange for helping me reach this goal, my backers can receive:

For a $5 donation (toward making the project happen): my appreciation!
For $19: an advance copy of The Reluctant Apostate (before it is released on Amazon).
For $25: a signed advance copy of The Reluctant Apostate (before it is released on Amazon).
For $45: a signed advance copy of The Reluctant Apostate (before it is released on Amazon) with the backer's name in the Acknowledgments.

Any excess funds pledged will go toward printing and mailing extra books for reviewers, promoting the book, and otherwise assisting with my activism work (including upgrading equipment, paying web hosting costs, and buying a new 12-month subscription to the SurveyMonkey service for the JWsurvey.org Global Survey of Jehovah's Witnesses).
If I do not reach my goal, any funds will go toward meeting what costs I can, and I will explore alternative ways of raising the remaining money.

The Impact
In case you are wondering why there is a need for this campaign, or what difference your contribution will make...

There are currently 8 million Jehovah's Witnesses worldwide, many of whom have been raised in their religion from birth and never exposed to information that objectively scrutinizes their beliefs. This book offers a thorough debunking of the main Witness teachings and practices. It even has "For Witnesses" boxes with key points for indoctrinated Witnesses to consider.
The organization behind the Witnesses is intent on spreading its influence and attracting more converts from among those never raised as Witnesses. This book will assist those with little or no knowledge of the religion to prepare against ever getting roped in to the faith, perhaps at a time when they are emotionally vulnerable (which is when cults are most effective at recruiting).
By backing this project, you are supporting someone with (1) the knowledge and experience to tackle the subject, (2) the determination to make this book as thorough, readable and enjoyable as it can possibly be, (3) an established track record in anti-cult activism, and (4) a large audience that can give the book the head start it needs to be successful.


Risks & Challenges
Whenever you involve multiple people in a project, there are bound to be risks. But I am being careful to only use the services of experienced colleagues known for their high standards. I also intend to check quality at every stage. For example, I will be ordering sample copies of The Reluctant Apostate from the printers to make sure the copies I will be sending out are printed to the same high standard I would expect. 
As for the book itself, a team of 10 editors, some of whom have professional editing experience, are helping me with checking the quality of the text and making sure the spelling, grammar and punctuation are all up to a suitable standard.
I have every confidence that the finished book will be enjoyed by many, and I take my duty to send out copies to my backers extremely seriously.
In short:

I am working with the right people, who are just as passionate about this project as I am.
I have extremely high standards for this book. I am not writing a book just for the sake of it - I want the finished article to make its mark on the planet and stand the test of time!
In the worst case scenario, I have other options for raising the needed funds. However, an Indiegogo campaign seems like the best way to let my supporters get involved and receive a special reward for their generosity.


Other Ways You Can Help
It might be that you are not in a position to order a book, or donate money. If so, you can still help me in the following ways:

You can share links to this Indiegogo campaign (or the trailer video) on Reddit, or on Facebook and Twitter. Doing this is ALWAYS appreciated!
You can spread the word among any friends, family or work colleagues who might be interested in reading the book, or backing the project.

However you decide to get behind the project, you have my sincere gratitude!

story:
My request         (Please view the PowerPoint above!)

Friends, I need your help to respond to an urgent cry from Christians of the Holy Land!  Many of these are people I know personally.  I've worshipped with them in Bethlehem and Jerusalem. I have been a guest in their homes and have seen first-hand the confiscation of their land and water, the destruction of their businesses,  and attempts to humiliate them at checkpoints built deep inside their own territory. Orchards where  I walked with families have been uprooted, and homes destroyed.

 

These realities are not discussed in our newspapers, but are very real nonetheless, and are confirmed by many human rights organizations, missionaries, and witnesses of every faith.  Americans cannot begin to imagine the hardship Christians and Muslims of the Holy Land face under Israel's occupation. The freedoms we take for granted here are denied to these warm and dignified people, simply because of their ethnicity. Even water is distributed according to ethnic group in the occupied territories, with Israelis receiving four times as much water as Palestinians! 

 

Palestinian Christians have urged us in a beautiful letter called the "Kairos Palestine Document" to put actions behind our words for a just peace. I hope you'll support "Kairos Response," a broad grassroots movement in the United Methodist Church which seeks to remove a contradiction between our church's words and actions. We are setting an example for others to follow by urging removal of church funds from a small group of companies that play a direct role in the occupation.  These are not Israeli companies, and the measure does not involve divestment from Israel.  In fact, we have the support of many Jewish groups, rabbis and Israelis.  

 

The vote will take place in early May. Your donations are urgently needed to help us communicate with delegates and bring Holy Land Christians to our conference. Please help ensure our success!

 

You can learn more about this initiative at www.kairosresponse.org or write me at susannehoder@aol.com 

 

Thank you from the bottom of my heart!

Susanne

story:
Die Geschichten unserer Tage –

wollen wir jetzt auch drucken.

Die erste Printausgabe von ROSEGARDEN ist fertig. Aber noch nicht produziert. Gedruckt wird, wenn es uns gelingt, an dieser Stelle genügend Käufer für das Magazin zu finden. Für 11,00 Euro kannst du hier ab sofort unser Magazin bestellen. Damit sorgst du dafür, dass zahlreiche Geschichten zur Frage 'Was ist Zuhause?' das Licht der Welt erblicken. Und du leistest einen wertvollen Beitrag, den Markt der Independent Magazine um ein besonderes Gesellschaftsmagazin reicher zu machen.

Seit 2013 – neugierig, lebendig und persönlich

Bereits seit April 2013 erzählt und bespricht ROSEGARDEN als Online-Magazin auf Talk-Veranstaltungen und im Radio die Themen, Ideen und Menschen unserer Tage. Ob Sharing Economy, Pop-Up Kultur, Multioptionalität, Musik, Bücher, Design oder Kunst – Rosegarden betrachtet unabhängig, neugierig, subjektiv, ironisch, klug, streitbar und lebendig die Welt, in der wir uns bewegen.

Doch kein Glamour ohne dich: Unsere Themen sind persönlich. Mal reflektieren wir über Berlin, mal erklären wir die Foodie-Sprache, mal treffen wir Sophie Auster oder stellen euch das Kalecollective vor. Unsere Geschichten sind das, was unsere Leser leben. Jeden Tag. Sie sind der wahre Lifestyle unserer Zeit.

Ein Heft sagt mehr als tausend Klicks

Nach vier digitalen Ausgaben, fast 300 Beiträgen, die über 40.000 Mal gelesen wurden, haben wir festgestellt, dass manche Themen mehr Raum brauchen als ein Lesezeichen im Browser. Sie gehören abgedruckt auf Papier, wo sie in Ruhe gelesen, wieder gelesen und vielleicht weitergegeben werden können.



Titelthema: "Was ist Zuhause?"

Passend dazu vielleicht auch das Titelthema unserer ersten Printausgabe für die zahlreiche Autoren, Fotografen und Illustratoren bewegende, verblüffende und spannende Beiträge geliefert haben. Auf 116 Seiten bietet das Heft einen umfassenden Einblick in die Frage, was Zuhause heute bedeuten kann.

Sneak Preview: Ein Blick ins Heft

Zuhause im Bürgerkrieg. Der syrische Künstler Ziad Adwan beschreibt, wie man über Zuhause denkt, wenn dort Krieg herrscht. (Foto: Tabea Mathern)


Nachbarschaft. Die Fotografin Iris Vetter zeigt und beschreibt in ihrer Bilderserie eine niederländischen White Trash Community. (Foto: Iris Vetter)


Leben und Arbeiten. Das Berliner Architektur- und Designbüro KINZO berichtet über die Gestaltung des Berlin Soundcloud Headquarters.  (Foto: Werner Huthmacher)


Diese und viele andere Geschichten und Bilder unter anderem von Kevin Junk, Saskia Vogel, Christian Ludwig oder Tabea Mathern möchten wir gerne in deine Hände geben. Wunderschön gestaltet auf hochwertigem Papier. Denn wir glauben fest daran: Unsere Geschichten müssen gedruckt werden!



Das Rosegarden-Team

ROSEGARDEN ist das Herausgeber-Team um Maren Heltsche, Mario Münster in Berlin, May-Britt Frank-Grosse in New York, Bertram Sturm in Hamburg, unsere studentische Mitarbeiterin Lena Baseler und mittlerweile gut 30 Autoren.


Das passiert mit deinem Geld

Aufhänger unserer Kampagne ist ein einfacher Gedanke: Du kaufst das Magazin, bevor es gedruckt wird.

Damit hilfst du uns, die nötigen Investitionen für die Produktion zu bewältigen. Und bekommst ein druckfrisches Magazin, sobald es fertig ist, zu dir nach Hause geliefert.

Natürlich freuen wir uns auch über ideelle Beiträge: Egal ob du nur 5 Euro geben magst, oder uns mit einem höheren Betrag unterstützen möchtest: Jeder Euro hilft und wird in die Produktion, die Vermarktung und den Vertrieb unserer ersten Printausgabe fließen.


Du findest die Idee toll, möchtest nicht spenden und uns dennoch helfen?

Wunderbar! Dann kannst du Folgendes machen:

1. Besuche unsere Seite unter www.rosegarden-mag.de und lies unsere Geschichten. Jeder Leser freut uns.

2. Folge uns auf Facebook, Twitter oder Instagram.

3. Abonniere unsere Freitagspost, mit der du jeden Freitag Leseempfehlungen und Veranstaltungstipps erhältst.

4. Und das Wichtigste: Teile unsere Kampagne, erzähle anderen davon!


Herausforderungen

Print lebt! Das Medienbusiness ist nicht einfach. Täglich sterben Zeitungen und Magazine. Aber auch beinahe täglich werden wunderbare neue Ideen geboren.

Und wir glauben fest an unsere Idee eines unabhängigen Gesellschaftsmagazins – online und offline! Unsere Geschichten beschreiben in vielen Momentaufnahmen die Welt, in der wir leben. Und deshalb müssen wir sie erzählen. Und egal, wie das hier ausgeht: Wir werden weiter diese Geschichten erzählen.

Wir danken dir sehr für deine Zeit und hoffentlich für deine Unterstützung!

Maren, Mario, May-Britt, Bertram und Lena

story:
Short Summary

Hi! I'm Miranda Doerfler, a 21 year old horror, espionage, mystery and thriller writer. I am doing everything I can to reach my goals, and that's what this campaign is about.

I recently wrote a zombie thriller novella called DEAD INSIDE, which I was lucky enough to get a publisher for. However, there are some printing and initial fees that go with getting the book published and getting it out there, and I need some help in covering those fees.

It's been a dream of mine to be published since I was seven years old, and this will be my first commercial publication. I'm hoping this will kick off my career as a writer.

What We Need & What You Get

This campaign is to raise $1000, total. About a third of that goes to publication fees, while the rest goes to paying the cover artist for his work, ordering copies, having keychains made and promoting the book.

The perks include the aforementioned limited edition keychains, copies of the ebook version of DEAD INSIDE, copies of my upcoming zombie short DECAY and a few autographed paperbacks of DEAD INSIDE.

If I don't reach my entire goal, anything I make will go to the publication fees and ordering copies of DEAD INSIDE for sales and promotion.

The Impact

This is really about helping an ambitious indie writer who refuses to give up her dream of being published. I want this more than anything, and knowing that I have support means so much to me.

I have had the honor of being on an author panel at a zombie convention recently to promote DEAD INSIDE and discuss it with an audience of about 50 people, and in the company of four other authors.

I intend to continue attending conventions whenever I can to speak on panels about this book, as well as doing whatever I'm able to do to promote it. It's the most important thing to me, and reaching this campaign goal will help immensely.

Other Ways You Can Help

Hey, if you have read this far, you are awesome! Some people can't contribute, and if you can't, that's totally fine. I appreciate you taking the time to check out my campaign. But don't think you can't do anything - you can still help!
 
If you have a Twitter or a Facebook, please tweet/post about my campaign, tell your followers and friends, spread the word as far as you can! Don't forget, you can also use the IndieGoGo sharing tools!
 
Thanks so much, and here's to reaching this campaign goal!

story:
My name is Constance Moonzwe- Nyirenda. I currently reside in beautiful, sunny California. I have my Bachelor of Science in Human Resources from Cal Poly Pomona and My Masters in Health Administration from the University of La Verne. I have worked in Human Resource Management and Recruitment for over 12 years, earning my first Job as HR Director at the age of 20.

I currently spend several hours a week giving individuals advice on how they can successfully navigate the job market. According to the New York Times there are more than 600,000 jobs available in the construction industry alone! So the question is, why are so many people having a hard time finding a job? This book will give individuals tools that they can apply directly to their efforts. This project is a passion of mine. Every day I interact with people who are struggling financially, depressed because they have been out of work for month’s- even years... this deeply saddens me.

I believe finding a job takes strategic planning. Approaching the problem as if it were a sales and marketing issue helps to focus the individual’s efforts on achieving specific goals. Successful sales mangers employ very specific strategies that yield results, often incrementally. This book shows the potential employee how to use those exact sales strategies to achieve the ultimate goal of getting hired.

What We Need & What You Get

If I reach my goal of $20,000 I will do all of the following.

Hire a professional editing service to ensure the flow, readability and understandability of the content.

Get published as an eBook available on Amazon and I tunes

Market the eBook using Google Adwords and Facebook

Create a website, blog and several landing pages, including merchant accounts.

Create a lead list using tools such as Aweber and Constant Contact

Conduct a series of interviews with specials guest speakers (recruiters and hiring managers) that would be streamed on my blog for free.

Conduct free informational seminars for the job seeker.

Give away free resources, tips and apps to help individuals be as successful as possible.

Give away 100 copies of the book for free.

Helping people apply proven strategies to improve their chances of getting hired will not only help the individuals who read the book, it has the potential of changing the lives and bringing hope to countless others who may have given up. Even if someone has a job already, understanding the tools outlined in this book can give them the confidence to encourage others to reposition themselves and realize their potential.

Other Ways You Can Help

If you cannot give, please share my campaign on your social media sites, with your family and co-workers and with anyone you may know who might be interested in supporting this cause

Conduct a series of interviews with specials guest speakers (recruiters and hiring managers) that would be streamed on my blog for free.
Conduct free informational seminars for the job seeker.
Give away free resources, tips and apps to help individuals be as successful as possible.
Give away 100 copies of the book for free.
Helping people apply proven strategies to improve their chances of getting hired will not only help the individuals who read the book, it has the potential of changing the lives and bringing hope to countless others who may have given up. Even if someone has a job already, understanding the tools outlined in this book can give them the confidence to encourage others to reposition themselves and realize their potential.
Other Ways You Can Help
If you cannot give, please share my campaign on your social media sites, with your family and co-workers and with anyone you may know who might be interested in supporting this cause

story:
A Note From Jen

When Geordan spoke at Gina's funeral, I saw a young girl, wise beyond her years.  I always knew she had a story to tell. Now that she's 18, she's agreed to be transparent and to share it so that it can help others. 

Geordan's life has not been a typical childhood but just graduated and is about to publish her first book.  It's wonderful that anyone can do anything if they put their mind to it. 

The reason this book is so special is because the timeline is based off real notes and journal entires from Gina, Geordan and I.  The reader gets to follow  how we all struggled in real time (knowing some of the outcomes) we would endure. 

We've written, edited and pitched our book and we're passionate about getting it published.

By pre-purchasing your copy, you'll receive it before anyone else (all while helping us with some up front expenses.)

We're looking to raise at least $3500.00  That should be enough for any last minute editing and self-publishing. 

  • $20.00 - we will send you a signed copy once published. 
  • $50.00 - we will send you a signed copy once published "and" you will be acknowledged in the book for being a "super supporter." 
  • $100.00 will get 5 copies of the book and will be acknowledged for being a "super supporter." 

Every contribution is super important to us.  We need roughly 200-250 friends and family to help us. 

Consider

  • This is a true story about how drug & alcohol abuse can affect a family. 
  • Although Geordan's life was difficult, she loves her mom more than anything. 
  • Your support can change lives. 

This journey has been a challenge but we would not have made it this far without you.  

  • We've pitched this story to 7 hollywood agents, producers and directors.
  • We've come this far in 6 short months. 

It's ok if you can't donate money at this time.

 It could also help us to::

  • Share the story and make some noise on social media.
  • By using the Indiegogo share tools - it will help improve visibiity. 

Thanks again for your support!

Jen

story:
Congrats! We did it! Thank you to all the Supporters!

We are 112% funded and grateful for all of your help. If you are looking for a way to get a copy of The Lost Heir, check my website. I will have a few copies of the Author's Edition left and as soon as the First Edition is ready, we will have it available via this same link to my website. 

 

Ari Ara Needs You! Bring a Great Novel Into the World!

Going beyond dragon-slayers and sword-swingers, The Lost Heir blends fantasy and adventure with social justice issues in an unstoppable story that will make you cheer!

This is the story your heart's been longing to hear! Let's bring this magical book into the world. Ari Ara - our plucky shero of The Way Between - won friends of all ages when her first story was released. Now, it's time for the next book, an epic adventure we've all been waiting for. Join in the fun and celebration of the Community Publishing Campaign. Through it, we're going to wage peace with a pen that's mightier than the sword. We're going to teach nonviolence through fantasy and adventure. We're going to put this novel in the hands of young change-makers. And we're going to have a lot of fun doing it.

Click on the thank-you perks to find out all the special gifts that go with each offering, including short stories, original artwork, bookmarks, special deals, and more! With the Community Publishing Campaign's exclusive release of this exciting novel, you'll be able to read it months ahead of the public release.  

The Lost Heir is for mighty girls and courageous boys,
adventure-seekers, peacebuilders, parents, teachers, and everyone else!

With all the fun of a sword-swinging adventure, but without the violence, The Lost Heir spins a spectacular story with strong female characters and powerful social justice themes. Young Ari Ara has been discovered to be the Lost Heir, the double royal daughter of two nations. When she learns that her mother's people have forced her father's desert people to sell their labor in exchange for water, she sets out on a quest for justice. 'Armed' with nonviolence and love, Ari Ara launches a youth movement to restore the honor and dignity of both her peoples. Unexpected allies rush to her side: the urchin queen, a monkish young scholar, a desert seamstress, and a mysterious hawk keeper. Before she knows it, she's sparked an uprising like nothing Mariana Capital has ever seen!

A shero with spunk and spark, Ari Ara confronts prejudice, discrimination, bullying, violence, and injustice with all the action, adventure, magic, and fantasy that readers love!

Kids, parents, and teachers agree: you'll love this book!

The Community Publishing Campaign gives YOU the chance to help bring a great book into the world. Give generously. We have some great deals in this year's perks. We also have lots of opportunities to go above and beyond with your generosity. Your donations support my writing year-round and cover the publishing costs for these fantastic novels. So, thank you in advance for seeing - and supporting - the BIG vision. This year, we're encouraging everyone to get a copy of The Lost Heir for your enjoyment AND support the youth by picking up copies of The Lost Heir and The Way Between to give to a young friend, a relative, a local school or a public library. 

Special New Perks!

New Cover for The Way Between: Here's your chance to get a copy of the new edition of The Way Between with its new, beautiful cover designed for the growing series. We have sets of two and mix-and-match options so you can get copies of whichever books you need to share with old friends and new fans of Ari Ara's adventures. Enjoy!

Supporter of the Series: this year, we have some unprecedented perks - including my favorite: the serialized Stories of the Third Brother. These mythical folktales of Alaren's adventures with the Way Between are inspired by real life stories of nonviolent action and peace work. As a Supporter of the Series, each week for 30 weeks, you will receive a story in your inbox with special commentary from Rivera Sun. These are the folktales of nonviolent history, turned into amazing, collectable stories for the Ari Ara Series. Thanks for being a "Supporter of the Series".

A Special Story for the Holidays: Alaren and the Feast Day Ceasefire. Happy Holidays, everyone! Since I know many of you are getting books as gifts, here's a unique and special perk to go with your Holiday Special: a short story from the Stories of the Third Brother collection about how Alaren halts a war on a magical night with a fiddle, a fire, and a great deal of courage.

Community Publisher's Outtake: Gems of chapters are put to the side in the process of creating a novel. Here's a sparkling diamond from my excerpts collection, reworked into a short story about the best part of Marin's Feast Day in Mariana Capital. Since you're the publisher, after all, here's a limited edition piece of writing that only Community Publishers will see!

Thank you! Click on each perk to find out more special thank-you gifts from Rivera Sun. 

 


 

Vision. Courage. Love. That's the recipe for my novels... and for the community of people, like yourself, who bring them into the world. The Lost Heir is a fantasy with a purpose, swapping out swords for the tools of modern heroes and sheroes who follow in the mythic footsteps of people like Gandhi, King, Chavez, Dolores Huerta, Leymah Gbowee, and millions more. I'm a writer on a quest: to create loveable stories with strong sheroes (and heroes) that use nonviolence to wage peace and work for justice.

It's a tall order. But we're doing it. When we brought The Way Between into existence, children around the country and across the world fell in love with this story. I've received letters and photos, notes from parents and grandparents, paintings and drawings of Ari Ara. Grown men have told me they wept their way through its heartwarming story.

Clearly, we're onto something.

My editor says The Lost Heir is even better than The Way Between. High praise from a one-time skeptic of this series who then cried like a baby after reading the first book. He says this novel shows the power we all have inside to work for justice with nonviolence. He says the plot twist at the end (and no, I'm not going to tell you) is so moving he almost couldn't breathe - even reading the scene for the second (or tenth) time.

Here's my hope: that you'll get a copy for yourself... and that you'll introduce a new young person to these books. Give a gift that inspires the next generation. Give the gift of strong characters - both real and fictional - to a world that desperately needs them. You can also donate a copy to your local library. It's a great way to give this book to hundreds of people all at once.

Thank you. For all of your generosity, faith in these books, and support throughout the years until this day. I couldn't do this without you.

With love and gratitude,

Rivera Sun

PS Like this idea?  Share it on Facebook and Twitter.  Friends love being involved in uplifting, change-the-world projects... don't leave them out of the fun!
